examples.jyutping: nei5 gong2 dou3 gung1 si1 gam3 caa1, jau6 m4 gin3 nei5 zau2?
examples.translation: If your company is as bad as you describe, how come you haven't resigned yet?

senses.definition: 用嚟叫人唔使擔心、唔使驚嘅時候講嘅嘢 (an exclamation of reassurance, "Don't worry!", "Don't be afraid!"; literally: there is nothing to fear)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
形容行為或品格唔似一個人，好似禽獸咁樣，無情、凶殘、貪婪 (unfeeling; inhuman; beastly; cruel; literally: not the conduct of a human being)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 嗰度班黑社會唔係人噉品㗎，見人就打，你哋小心啲呀。
examples.jyutping: go2 dou6 baan1 hei1 se5 wui2 m4 hai6 jan4 gam2 ban2 gaa3, gin3 jan4 zau6 daa2, nei5 dei6 siu2 sam1 di1 aa3
examples.translation: The gangsters there are truly inhuman; they beat people up at the drop of a hat. You guys ought to be careful.

senses.definition: 唔道德；#賤格 (mean; virtueless)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 亂拋垃圾咁冇品都有嘅！
examples.jyutping: lyun6 paau1 laap6 saap3 gam3 mou5 ban2 dou1 jau5 ge2!
examples.translation: How inconsiderate you are to litter!

senses.definition: 唔會到呢個地步；唔使去到呢個地步 (to not go so far as to; to not reach a certain extent)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: gam2 jau6 mei6 zi3 jyu1
examples.translation: Not to that extent.

senses.definition: 覺得肉麻、核突、恐怖嗰陣，身上面嘅毛豎起晒嘅生理反應 (to creep one out; to give one the creeps; to get goosebumps; literally: hairs standing on end)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢兩個成日喺大家面前攬攬錫錫，真係睇見都毛管戙呀。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 loeng5 go3 seng4 jat6 hai2 daai6 gaa1 min6 cin4 laam2 laam2 sek3 sek3, zan1 hai6 tai2 gin3 dou1 mou4 gun2 dung6 aa3.
examples.translation: The two of them always hug and kiss in front of everyone. I'm getting goosebumps looking at them.

senses.definition: 聽到、睇到或諗到某事時，引起嘅不舒服感覺。 (describes a feeling of unwellness or nausea upon hearing, seeing, or thinking about something)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: juk6 maa4
examples.translation: nauseating; sickening

senses.definition: 煩多而瑣碎 (very annoying and petty)

examples.jyutping: maa4 faan4
examples.translation: annoying

senses.definition: 面部痘瘢，引申指物體表面粗糙 (facial pockmark; its meaning has been extended to refer to coarseness on physical surfaces in general)

examples.jyutping: maa4 lim5
examples.translation: pockmarked face

senses.definition: 一種由#花椒 刺激嘅味道，條脷感到震 (a taste where the lip feels vibration, caused by a chemical in Sichuan peppercorn)
#道教 嘅其中一個教派 (Maoshan School in Taoism)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #甲醇 俗稱 (common name of methanol)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 因為唔小心、冇留意而做咗一啲嘢，唔係#有心 嘅 (unintentionally; not on purpose; carelessly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我唔覺意打爛咗個花樽。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 gok3 ji3 daa3 laan6 zo2 go3 faa1 zeon1.
examples.translation: I carelessly broke the vase.

senses.definition: 指一啲小錯誤或違規行為，唔會對整體造成太大影響 ((of minor mistakes or violations) to not have a significant impact on the overall situation)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #有啲；帶負面屬性 (rather; a bit too (usually with a negative connotation))
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 你噉對人又未免太過份。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam2 deoi3 jan4 jau6 mei6 min5 taai3 gwo3 fan6.
examples.translation: It's rather harsh of you to treat people like that.

senses.definition: 用嚟拒絕，即係「唔使」、「唔好」、「免嘞」 (used for refusal; "no, thanks"; "why bother")
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 形容件事已成定局，冇得逆轉 (to describe a situation that is already fixed or irreversible)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 好少交流、接觸，甚至一啲都冇，所以唔了解，亦都冇留過咩印象；冇#生保 咁貼近口語 (strange; unfamiliar; less colloquial than #生保)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: mak6 sang1 jan4
examples.translation: stranger

senses.definition: 唔涉及#刑事 嘅法律爭議，通常係雙方錢債、業權等等嘅爭議 (of or pertaining to civil law (as opposed to criminal law))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: man4 si6 on3 gin2
examples.translation: civil case

senses.definition: 讀得多書、學識豐富嘅人；有文化素養、對文學有充足認識嘅人（量詞：個） (scholar; literati, man of letters, people having sufficient knowledge towards literature and cultural practices)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: man4 jan4 soeng1 hing1
examples.translation: literates tend to scorn each other

senses.definition: 羞恥心；自己會唔會覺得羞恥嘅程度（量詞：塊） (boldness; shamelessness; cheekiness; literally, cheek, face)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: min6 pei4 hau5
examples.translation: shameless

senses.definition: 拒絕要求嘅時候講嘅嘢，通常係小朋友或者女仔用嘅 (expression for refusing or turning down a request, typically used by children or in a flirtatious manner by young women; no; no way)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 阿媽：「未做完功課唔准食雪糕呀吓。」阿仔：「唔制！我要食咗先做！」
examples.jyutping: aa3 maa1 - mei6 zou6 jyun4 gong1 fo3 m4 zeon2 sik6 syut3 gou1 aa3 haa2. aa3 zai2 - m4 zai3! ngo5 jiu3 sik6 zo2 sin1 zou6!
examples.translation: Mum goes, "No ice cream until you have finished your homework." Son goes, "No! I'll do it when I get my ice cream!

senses.definition: #靠岸；#上岸；呢個字#水上人 用得多 (to get on the shore; literally: to reach the street)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #觀察力 嘅戲稱 (a malapropism (intentional using a wrong word for comedic effect) of #觀察力)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 師兄你嘅摩擦力好強喎！
examples.jyutping: si1 hing1 nei5 ge3 mo1 caat3 lik6 hou2 koeng4 wo5!
examples.translation: Hey brother, your observation skills are impressive!

senses.definition: 數學中，一個數自乘、幾多#次方 嘅結果 ((mathematics) the result of exponentiation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sap6 ge3 ji6 ci3 mik6 hai6 jat1 baak3.
examples.translation: Ten to the power of two equals one hundred.

senses.definition: 電視、電台進入播#告白（#廣告）嘅環節 (to air advertisements)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 未做住，仲賣緊告白，唔使急。
examples.jyutping: mei6 zou6 zyu6, zung6 maai6 gan2 gou3 baak6, m4 sai2 gap1.
examples.translation: The show hasn't started yet. It's still airing the advertisements. No need to hurry.

senses.definition: 喺意外嘅時間場合推銷產品 (to advertise during an unrelated time or venue)

examples.text: 頭先世界盃直播嗰陣，個講波佬無端端同隻能量飲品賣告白。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 sai3 gaai3 bui1 zik6 bo3 go2 zan6, go3 gong2 bo1 lou2 mou4 dyun1 dyun1 tung4 zek3 nang4 loeng6 jam2 ban2 maai6 gou3 baak6.
examples.translation: The commentator suddenly advertised about an energy drink in the middle of World Cup broadcast.

senses.definition: 一種#電單車，司機座位喺#引擎 上面，雙腳平放車底板 (motor scooter; literally: little sheep)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 細隻嘅綿羊 (a small sheep)
改裝咗主要得返座位嘅輕型貨車，大約可以坐十個人（量詞：部／架） (a modified light truck, primarily retaining only the seating area, can accommodate approximately ten people)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 出名；著名；好多人都知 (to be famous)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 ge3 je6 ging2 man4 ming4 sai3 gaai3.
examples.translation: Hong Kong is renowned for its night view.

senses.definition: 唔具備某個領域知識嘅人；外行人（量詞：個） (outsider; layperson; literally: man outside door)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 氣象嚟講，我係門外漢，最多都係留意官方公佈之餘，睇埋坊間愛好研究者嘅資訊啫。
examples.jyutping: hei3 zoeng6 lai4 gong2, ngo5 hai6 mun4 ngoi6 hon3, zeoi3 do1 dou1 hai6 lau4 ji3 gun1 fong1 gung1 bou3 zi1 jyu4, tai2 maai4 fong1 gaan1 oi3 hou3 jin4 gau3 ze2 ge3 zi1 seon3 ze1.
examples.translation: When it comes to meteorology, I'm a layperson. I just follow official updates and informal insights from hobbyist meteorologists.

senses.definition: 都未係太、都唔係話 (not very; not too; not quite)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 呢個賣二百蚊都未算好貴，合理價錢嚟嘅。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 maai6 ji6 baak3 man1 dou1 mei6 syun3 hou2 gwai3, hap6 lei5 gaa3 cin4 lei4 ge3.
examples.translation: It isn't that expensive for this to sell for 200 dollars. It's a reasonable price.

senses.definition: 出於抗拒，叫人唔好預自己一份，令自己牽涉在內 ((in rejection or refusal) don't include/involve me; don't count me in)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: gam3 jit6 haang4 saan1? mai5 gaau2 ngo5!
examples.translation: Go hiking in such a hot weather? No, thanks!

senses.definition: 唔係點；冇乜點；好少；低頻率 (not often; seldom; not many times)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 平時唔多做運動，又食咁多肥膩嘢，好快變大肥貓㗎。
examples.jyutping: ping4 si4 m4 do1 zou6 wan6 dung6, jau6 sik6 gam3 do1 fei4 nei6 je5, hou2 faai3 bin3 daai6 fei4 maau1 gaa3.
examples.translation: You rarely exercise and you consume so much greasy food. You'll be obese soon.

senses.definition: 唔係好；唔（冇咁強烈）；低程度 (not so; not much; not (less strong))

examples.text: 阿希同佢阿哥唔多似樣。
examples.jyutping: aa3 hei1 tung4 keoi5 aa3 go1 m4 do1 ci5 joeng2.
examples.translation: Hei and his elder brother do not look much alike.

senses.definition: 唔使噉做；唔係一定要做 (to be unnecessary; to not be required)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 汽車入口香港毋須畀税，但係登記要畀税。
examples.jyutping: hei3 ce1 jap6 hau2 hoeng1 gong2 mou4 seoi1 bei2 seoi3, daan6 hai6 dang1 gei3 jiu3 bei2 seoi3.
examples.translation: There is no tax on car imports, but vehicle registration is taxed.

senses.definition: 疑問代詞，用嚟提問一啲唔清楚嘅事物 (what; interrogative pronoun used to enquire about something unclear)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 gan2 mat1 je5 aa3?
examples.translation: What are you doing?

senses.definition: 疑問代詞，用嚟做定語，提問特定一樣嘢嘅詳細資訊 (what; what kind of; interrogative pronoun used as a modifier to request more detailed information about the specific thing that is modified)

examples.jyutping: ni1 bun2 hai6 mat1 je5 syu1 lai4 gaa3?
examples.translation: What book is this?

senses.definition: 一時之間諗唔起個講法嘅時候，或者唔想講得太清楚嘅時候，用嚟攝位 (used as a gap-filler or placeholder when one cannot find the right word or when one wants to avoid mentioning something)

examples.text: 嗰個乜嘢呀，下次拎俾我吖。
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 mat1 je5 aa3, haa6 ci3 ling1 bei2 ngo5 aa1.
examples.translation: That thing, whatever it's called... can you bring it to me next time?

senses.definition: 泛指任何嘢，通常後面會有「#都」 (whatever; usually followed by #都 dou1)

examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 mat1 je5 ngo5 dou1 wui5 bei2 nei5.
examples.translation: I will give you whatever you ask for.

senses.definition: 用嚟反詰，以表達鄙視、不滿、驚訝 (used to form rhetorical questions so as to express disapproval, dismay, or astonishment)

examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 mat1 je5 jing1 man2 lai4 gaa3
examples.translation: What kind of English is that?

senses.definition: 唔使用手操作嘅裝置、唔使自己落手嘅服務 (hand-free device, hand-free service)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: min5 tai4 ji5 tung2
examples.translation: hand-free earphone

senses.definition: 電話免提耳機嘅略縮詞 (short form of hand-free earphone of mobile phone)

examples.text: 揸車記得戴返免提，揸緊車嗰時揸住部電話嚟傾係犯法㗎。
examples.jyutping: zaa1 ce1 gei3 dak1 daai3 faan1 min5 tai4, zaa1 gan2 ce1 go2 si4 zaa1 zyu6 bou6 din6 waa2 lai4 king1 hai6 faan6 faat3 gaa3.
examples.translation: Remember to use hands-free while driving. It is illegal to hold your phone while driving.

senses.definition: 形容人好守舊固執，唔肯聽人嘅意見 (stubborn; prim; reluctant to take advice)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢好萌塞㗎，你同佢講都冇用。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 mang4 sak1 gaa3, nei5 tung4 keoi5 gong2 dou1 mou5 jung6.
examples.translation: He's stubborn. Talking to him won't help.

senses.definition: 對年紀比較細嘅女性比較親暱嘅叫法 (an endearing term for girls and young women, lit. girl piggy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 gei2 go3 mui1 zyu1 dou1 gei2 zeng3.
examples.translation: These young ladies are quite attractive.

senses.definition: 令一個問題嘅語氣變重嘅代名詞 (a pronoun used to strengthen the tone of a question)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 gau3 ging2 gaau2 mat1 gwai2 aa3
examples.translation: What on earth are you doing?

senses.definition: 指#任何#事物，亦都會令語氣變重 (anything)

examples.text: 乜鬼都好喇，有得食就得。
examples.jyutping: mat1 gwai2 dou1 hou2 laa3, jau5 dak1 sik6 zau6 dak1
examples.translation: Anything would be fine, as long as there's something to eat.

senses.definition: 加響人名或者指指向人嘅名詞（例如職業），表示蔑視或者唔記得完整名稱 (added before a singular name or a noun referencing a person so as to express one has forgotten their name or to show a degree of contempt)

examples.text: 嗰個乜鬼教授，講嘢咁鬼悶，怪唔之得冇人報佢嗰堂啦。
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 mat1 gwai2 gaau3 sau6, gong2 je5 gam3 gwai2 mun6, gwaai3 m4 zi1 dak1 mou5 jan4 bou3 keoi5 go2 tong4 laa1
examples.translation: That professor, whoever he is, is so boring. It's no wonder no one signs up for his class.

senses.definition: 填得好多又好密；放咗好多填充物 (dense and numerous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 排到啲字密麻麻，點睇啊？
examples.jyutping: paai4 dou3 di1 zi6 mat6 maa4 maa4, dim2 tai2 aa3?
examples.translation: The words are packed so closely together, how can anyone read them?

senses.definition: 錯；唔啱 (wrong)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: I'm wrong, I'm at fault.

senses.definition: 能夠摧毀任何堅固嘅嘢；亦都有用嚟形容某樣嘢力量強大可以克服任何困難。 (Implacable, unstoppable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 阿松佢真係以為自己個頭無堅不摧，諗住可以一頭扻爆塊瓦片... 結果而家入咗醫院。
examples.translation: A-chung really thought his head was unbreakable, believing he could smash a roof tile with it... and now he's in hospital.

senses.definition: 冇用；做唔到嘢；幫唔到；能力低下 (useless; helpless to others)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 政府官員無能加速社會嘅分化。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 gun1 jyun4 mou4 nang4 gaa1 cuk1 se5 wui2 ge3 fan1 faa3.
examples.translation: That the government officials are incompetent has accelerated the polarization of society.

senses.definition: 完全無線索，無法追查嘅#案件 或 #畸士（量詞：件） (unsolved crimes; clueless and mysterious cases)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢排新確診個案屬無頭公案，源頭不明。
examples.jyutping: ni1 paai4 san1 kok3 can2 go3 on3 suk6 mou4 tau4 gung1 on3, jyun4 tau4 bat1 ming4.
examples.translation: The new infectious cases are a mystery with no known origin.

senses.definition: #美國 嘅#法定貨幣 (United States dollar)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 去旅行之前記得暢美金呀。
examples.jyutping: heoi3 leoi5 hang4 zi1 cin4 gei3 dak1 coeng3 mei5 gam1 aa3.
examples.translation: Remember to exchange some USD before you go on your trip.

senses.definition: 蠢人；懵盛盛嘅人；亦都用嚟指稱一啲自己睇唔起嘅人（量詞：條） (fool; moron; trash; also used to refer to someone that the speaker does not approve of)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 門口度有幾條茂利話要揾你喎。
examples.jyutping: mun4 hau2 dou6 jau5 gei2 tiu4 mau6 lei2 waa6 jiu3 wan2 nei5 wo5.
examples.translation: I saw some fools at the entrance. They say they want to see you.

senses.definition: 用嚟構成是非問句，表示疑問、質疑、驚訝，讀起嚟語調短促 (used to form yes-no questions and to indicate doubt, challenge or surprise; uttered in a short and abrupt manner)
senses.label: 助詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 loeng4 sam1 gwo3 ji3 dak1 heoi3 me1?
examples.translation: Don't you feel any guilt at all?

senses.definition: 用喺反詰問句，帶有否定嘅口氣，會讀成高降調，可以拉長 (used in rhetorical questions to express negation; uttered with a high-falling tone and could be prolonged)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 ngaak1 nei5 jau5 zoeng2 me1?
examples.translation: Why the hell would I want to lie to you? (literally 'Am I going to get a prize for fooling you?')

senses.definition: 消磨時間；因為等緊一樣嘢，所以期間咩都唔做 (to kill time; to be idle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 做咩好啊，我要磨時間磨到三點呀…
examples.jyutping: zou6 me1 hou2 aa3, ngo5 jiu3 mo4 si4 gaan3 mo4 dou3 saam1 dim2 aa3...
examples.translation: What should we do now? I need to kill some time until it's three O’clock.

senses.definition: 難以補救、無法挽回 (to have no way to remedy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 搞到咁大件事，我諗都係冇得掹㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: gaau2 dou3 gam3 daai6 gin6 si6, ngo5 nam2 dou1 hai6 mou5 dak1 maang1 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: The issue has gotten way out of hand. I don’t think there is any way to fix it.

senses.definition: 從中得唔到可觀利益 (not benefited; literally "no meat to eat")
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: seoi2 wai2 gam3 zaak3, mou5 juk6 sik6 gaa3.
examples.translation: The profit margin is so narrow, you won't earn much.

senses.definition: 問得好仔細、好透徹，搞到畀人問嗰個覺得好煩 (to make detailed and thorough enquiries in an annoying way)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 細路仔最鍾意問長問短。
examples.jyutping: sai3 lou6 zai2 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 man6 coeng4 man6 dyun2.
examples.translation: Children love to ask a lot of questions.

senses.definition: 疑問代詞，用嚟提問一啲唔清楚嘅事物 (what)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 gan2 me1 je5 aa3?
examples.translation: What are you doing?

senses.definition: 疑問代詞，用嚟做定語，提問特定一樣嘢嘅詳細資訊 (what; what kind of)

examples.jyutping: ni1 bun2 hai6 me1 je5 syu1 lai4 gaa3?
examples.translation: What book is this?

senses.definition: 目光呆滯，反應遲鈍 (slow-witted; unresponsive)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 原來佢通咗晚頂，唔怪之得咁木獨啦。
examples.jyutping: jyun4 loi4 keoi5 tung1 zo2 maan5 deng2, m4 gwaai3 zi1 dak1 gam3 muk6 duk6 laa1.
examples.translation: Oh, so he pulled an all-nighter? No wonder he looks so dull.

senses.definition: 又呆又蠢，唔識同人溝通 (socially inept; incapable of effective communication)

examples.text: 佢個人好鬼木獨，叫佢上台講兩句嘢，佢就呆咗喺度粒聲唔出。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go3 jan4 hou2 gwai2 muk6 duk6, giu3 keoi5 soeng5 toi4 gong2 loeng5 geoi3 je5, keoi5 zau6 ngoi4 zo2 hai2 dou6 lap1 seng1 m4 ceot1.
examples.translation: He's a very dim-witted. I told him to say a few words on stage, but he just stood there silently.

senses.definition: #達到 (to meet, to fulfill, to satisfy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: mit1 taa1 get4
examples.translation: to meet target

senses.definition: #冇面；保持唔到自尊、尊嚴 (to lose face; to be embarrassed)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 叫咗你唔好咁大聲講嘢㗎啦！而家俾人趕走喇，幾面懵呢！
examples.jyutping: giu3 zo2 nei5 m4 hou2 gam3 daai6 seng1 gong2 je5 gaa3 laa1! ji4 gaa1 bei2 jan4 gon2 zau2 laa3, gei2 min6 mung2 ne1!
examples.translation: I told you to speak softly. Now that we've been kicked out, I feel so embarrassed!

senses.definition: 一個人睇嚟好蠢、好#鈍 (looking dumb)

examples.jyutping: min6 mung2 sam1 zeng1
examples.translation: Someone appears to be stupid but is actually smart or cunning

senses.definition: 唔係蓄意發出嘅力量，多數由身體自然動作引起（量詞：下／股） (unintentional force caused mostly by natural body movement; literally: heartless force)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喂！周圍咁多人你轉身小心啲得唔得呀？嗰下無情力撞到個細路瞓低喇。
examples.jyutping: wai3! zau1 wai4 gam3 do1 jan4 nei5 zyun3 san1 siu2 sam1 di1 dak1 m4 dak1 aa3? go2 haa5 mou4 cing4 lik6 zong6 dou3 go3 sai3 lou6 fan3 dai1 laa3.
examples.translation: Hey! Why were you so careless when you turned around in the crowd? You accidentally knocked over that kid.

senses.definition: 傳説或者故仔入面，唔靠掩眼法，但係又做到#魔術 甚至超過魔術嘅效果嘅#超自然 力量 (magic (magick); sorcery; wizardry)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 魔法喺奇幻文學入面係好常見嘅題材。
examples.jyutping: mo1 faat3 hai2 kei4 waan6 man4 hok6 jap6 min6 hai6 hou2 soeng4 gin3 ge3 tai4 coi4.
examples.translation: Magic is a common theme in fantasy literature.

phonetic.original: ming5 gei3 jyu1 sam1:ming4 gei3 jyu1 sam1

senses.definition: 深深記住 (to bear firmly in mind; to engrave something in one's heart)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老師嘅教導我一直銘記於心。
examples.jyutping: lou5 si1 ge3 gaau3 dou6 ngo5 jat1 zik6 ming5 gei3 jyu1 sam1.
examples.translation: What my teacher taught me has been etched firmly into my mind.

keywords: ming5 gei3 jyu1 sam1:ming4 gei3 jyu1 sam1

senses.definition: 深深記住 (to bear firmly in mind; to engrave something in one's heart)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ming5 gei3 jyu1 sam1
examples.translation: to bear firmly in mind

senses.definition: 超自然嘅力量，通常帶有負面、黑暗嘅意思 (occult; witchcraft; dark magic)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: mou4 po4
examples.translation: witch

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Mo" or "Mou")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 過得唔好；#難過、#難受 ((of a period of time) tough; difficult; hard; trying)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 初歷感情創傷肯定唔好過。
examples.jyutping: co1 lik6 gam2 cing4 cong3 soeng1 hang2 ding6 m4 hou2 gwo3.
examples.translation: The first heartbreak is definitely tough.

senses.definition: 負責設計、示範、執導高難度動作場戲嘅工作人員，簡稱#武指 (stunt coordinator)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一啲具有歷史、藝術、科學等文化保存價值嘅嘢，如物品、建築物、習俗，並由政府機構或國際組織記錄嘅稱號 (cultural heritage)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #泳鏡（量詞：副） (swimming goggles)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 哎呀，我冇帶到副眛鏡添。
examples.jyutping: ai1 jaa3, ngo5 mou5 daai3 dou3 fu3 mei6 geng3 tim1.
examples.translation: Oops, I forgot to wear my swimming goggles.

senses.definition: 一啲用嚟借助#超自然 力量嘅儀式、動作、或者咒語 (sorcery; magic; witchcraft)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
啱啱好達標咁做到一啲嘢 (to barely meet the standard; literally "to stand on the edges of a bus to have a free ride")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你科科都掹車邊，我睇你點升班！
examples.jyutping: nei5 fo1 fo1 dou1 maan1 ce1 bin1, ngo5 tai2 nei5 dim2 sing1 baan1!
examples.translation: You just barely passed all subjects, I wonder how you'll deal with the next grade.

senses.definition: 搭順風車 (to hitchhike)
形容#車、#船、#飛機、#冷氣機#引擎#功率，一匹馬力大約等於 746 #watt（量詞：匹） (horsepower; unit for measuring the power of an engine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 gaa3 paau2 ce1 ge3 maa5 lik6 hou2 gau3.
examples.translation: The horsepower of this sports car's engine is plenty!

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
未有內容 NO DATA
運作嘅方式或者狀態（量詞：個） (mode; model)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: seoi6 min4 mou4 sik1
examples.translation: sleep mode (of a device)

senses.definition: 會經常想做一啲冇乜可能發生嘅事嘅症狀 (paranoia)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢成日疑神疑鬼，可能有妄想症。
examples.translation: He is always suspicious and may have paranoid delusions.

senses.definition: 「#民主#運動」嘅簡稱，指爭取民主嘅大型行動（量詞：場／次） (democratic movement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: man4 wan6 jan4 si6
examples.translation: pro-democracy activist

senses.definition: 進入某個範圍參加特定活動或享用特定服務所需嘅憑證（量詞：張） (admission ticket)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jin2 coeng3 wui2 mun4 piu3 ji5 ging1 sau6 hing3.
examples.translation: The concert tickets are all sold out.

senses.definition: 形容一樣嘢望落好睇順眼 (pleasing to the eye; artistic; aesthetic)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢件傢俬又美觀又實用。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 gaa1 si1 jau6 mei5 gun1 jau6 sat6 jung6.
examples.translation: This furniture is both stylish and practical.

senses.definition: 地產買家確認人同賣家簽署正式買賣合約同畀咗訂金後，喺成交日期前（簽署樓契同畀餘額前），將項目賣畀另一個人 (confirmor sales)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 大專聯校巡迴舞蹈匯演；源於英文 mass dance 每隻字嘅第一個音節 (joint university mass dance; originating from the first syllable of each word in "mass dance" in English)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 孖釘班同學怕唔怕凍，我就唔知嘞。我淨係知佢哋嘅表演好精彩。
examples.jyutping: maa1 deng1 baan1 tung4 hok6 paa3 m4 paa3 dung3, ngo5 zau6 m4 zi1 laak3. ngo5 zing6 hai6 zi1 keoi5 dei6 ge3 biu2 jin2 hou2 zing1 coi2.
examples.translation: I have no idea whether the students performing in the mass dance are too weak to stand the coldness. I can only tell that their performance is fantastic.

senses.definition: 食肆提供，列出菜式、套餐嘅清單（量詞：個／張／本／份） (menu (of a restaurant))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: m4 goi1 bei2 go3 men1 niu2 lai4 aa1.
examples.translation: Can I have the menu, please?

senses.definition: 一種#真菌，天氣#潮濕 嘅時候最容易#滋生 (mould)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 市面上有好多產品專門清除霉菌。
examples.jyutping: si5 min6 soeng6 jau5 hou2 do1 caan2 ban2 zyun1 mun4 cing1 ceoi4 mui4 kwan2.
examples.translation: There are many products specifically designed to remove mold.

senses.definition: 一個動作或者計劃嘅期待嘅結果（量詞：個） (target; purpose; aim)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋無論用乜嘢方法，都要達到我哋嘅目的。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 mou4 leon6 jung6 mat1 je5 fong1 faat3 dou1 jiu3 daat6 dou3 ngo5 dei6 ge3 muk6 dik1
examples.translation: We have to meet our target by any means necessary.

senses.definition: #馬，通常用作合稱（量詞：隻） (horse(s), often as a collective address)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fan3 lin6 maa5 pat1
examples.translation: to train horses

senses.definition: #非常、#好，到一個超出對方設想嘅地步，暗示對方或其他人唔了解程度之高 (very; beyond imagination; to imply that the hearer or the others does not realize how high the level is)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢咩唔中意iPad呀，佢今年生日收到都唔知幾開心。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 me1 m4 zung1 ji3 aai1 paat1 aa3, keoi5 gam1 nin2 saang1 jat6 sau1 dou2 dou1 m4 zi1 gei2 hoi1 sam1.
examples.translation: He doesn't like iPads, you say? You have no idea how happy he was when he got it on his birthday this year.

senses.definition: 交叉相間 (alternating; in alternative series, in ABAB sequence. Literally: each two plum trees are separated by one bamboo tree)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢支叫「古惑的槍」，佢會一次向前射一次向後射梅花間竹噉嚟。
examples.translation: This is a 'Tricky Gun'. It fires alternately front and back.

senses.definition: 攞嚟鬧一個人生存喺世界上冇任何價值，不如死咗佢好過 (worthless; literally: useless as a living being)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 有冇人覺得自己唔死都冇用？
examples.jyutping: jau5 mou5 jan4 gok3 dak1 zi6 gei2 m4 sei2 dou1 mou5 jung6?
examples.translation: Does anyone feel completely useless?

senses.definition: 尷尬、出醜、驚慌嘅時候，急急腳離開一個地方 (to run away in hurry from an awkward situation (when one is embarrassed or being ridiculed), or intimidated; literally, "no shoes, grab a pair of clogs and run")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你再唔走呢，我就揾人打到你冇鞋挽屐走。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zoi3 m4 zau2 ne1, ngo5 zau6 wan2 jan4 daa2 dou3 nei5 mou5 haai4 waan2 kek6 zau2.
examples.translation: If you don't leave now, I will have someone beat you up.

senses.definition: 帶出大前提，冇咗大前提做其他嘢都係徒然 (everything will be meaningless / the plan will fail (unless a particular condition is met); literally: everything is fake)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: mou5 cin2 zau6 mat1 dou1 gaa2.
examples.translation: Without money, you can't do anything.

senses.definition: 喺好多#宗教 入面泛指同善良嘅#神 相對嘅邪惡主宰；引申為「#邪惡 嘅人或者物」嘅意思 (devil; demon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松抵受唔住魔鬼引誘走咗去買鹹濕書。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 dai2 sau6 m4 zyu6 mo1 gwai2 jan5 jau5 zau2 zo2 heoi3 maai5 haam4 sap1 syu1.
examples.translation: Ah Chung couldn't resist the Devil's temptation and bought some naughty books.

senses.definition: 毛髮。見 #毛管戙 (pore)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 咁恐怖嘅場面，睇到一定嚇到 #毛管戙 啊！
examples.jyutping: gam3 hung2 bou3 ge3 coeng4 min6, tai2 dou3 jat1 ding6 haak3 dou3 mou4 gun2 dung6 aa3
examples.translation: The scene was so frightening, it gave me goosebumps!

senses.definition: 入#客棧 住宿 (to go into an inn)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: It's getting late, we need to find an inn to stay for the night.

senses.definition: 明明冇緊要事，但係又展現到自己好辛苦噉，喺度#歎息 或者#感慨 (to be melancholic or angry despite not having any serious matter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我保你大喇！你唔好又喺度無病呻吟啦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bou2 nei5 daai6 laa3! nei5 m4 hou2 jau6 hai2 dou6 mou4 beng6 san1 jam4 laa1.
examples.translation: Please stop yelling, there's no real problem bothering you.

senses.definition: 對某人感到唔高興、唔同意、反感，令到個樣顯出反白眼、眼超超等不耐煩表情 (loathe; resent; being unfriendly towards)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 係咪唔順超呀？出嚟過兩招囉！
examples.jyutping: hai6 mai6 m4 seon6 ciu1 aa3? ceot1 lei4 gwo3 loeng5 ziu1 lo1!
examples.translation: Do you resent me? Come on, show me what you've got!

senses.definition: #冇搭霎 (no responsibility to do something)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 咪揾條友做野啦，佢咁冇根篼。
examples.jyutping: mai5 wan2 tiu4 jau2 zou6 je5 laa1, keoi5 gam3 mou5 gan1 dau1.
examples.translation: Please don't give him anything to do, because he is so irresponsible.

senses.definition: 一個人#瞓著 咗之後，由#大腦 所產生而通常控制唔到嘅影像、聲或者經歷（量詞：個） (dream)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 mung6
examples.translation: dreaming

senses.definition: 目標、理想或者#希望 可以做到嘅嘢，但係有啲遙遠，未必能夠實現到（量詞：個） (aspiration; goal; ideal)

examples.text: 我細個嗰陣有個夢，想大個咗做天文學家。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 sai3 go3 go2 zan2 jau5 go3 mung6, soeng2 daai6 go3 zo2 zou6 tin1 man4 hok6 gaa1.
examples.translation: When I was small, I once dreamt of becoming an astronomer when I grew up.

senses.definition: 用手掂，通常動作比較輕柔 (to feel with one's hand(s); to touch with one's hand(s))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你摸下我額頭睇我係咪發燒？
examples.jyutping: nei5 mo2 haa5 ngo5 ngaak6 tau4 tai2 ngo5 hai6 mai6 faat3 siu1?
examples.translation: Can you feel my forehead to see if I've got a fever?

senses.definition: 探索；用不斷嘗試嘅方法，揾出某啲資訊 (to make attempts at finding something out; to feel out; to sound out; to probe (for information))

examples.jyutping: mo2 jam1
examples.translation: to find out the pitch

senses.definition: 疑問代詞；「#乜嘢」嘅合音 (interrogative pronoun: what, who, when, etc.; contraction of #乜嘢 mat1 je5)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.text: 企喺佢隔籬嗰個係咩人嚟㗎？
examples.jyutping: kei5 hai2 keoi5 gaak3 lei4 go2 go3 hai6 me1 jan4 lai4 gaa3?
examples.translation: Who's the person standing next to him?

senses.definition: 講出數字或文字嗰陣，用以代替唔記得、唔識讀、講唔出嘅數字、文字或者音節 (used to replace a syllable, a word or a number which the speaker has forgotten or chooses to omit)

examples.text: 大陸唔係叫佢做碧咸㗎，叫貝克咩咩咁㗎！
examples.jyutping: daai6 luk6 m4 hai6 giu3 keoi5 zou6 bik1 haam4 gaa3, giu3 bui3 haak1 me1 me1 gam2 gaa3!
examples.translation: In Mainland, people don't call him "bik1 haam4", but use the name bui3-haak1-something-something instead.

senses.definition: 當擺喺一個詞前，表示嗰樣嘢印象模糊，記憶需時，又或者不屑提起 (when placed before a word, indicates that the speaker can hardly remember or is rather unwilling to mention it (perhaps out of disdain))

examples.text: 「慈禧」係簡稱嚟㗎，全名係咩「孝欽慈禧端佑康頤昭豫莊誠壽恭欽獻崇熙配天興聖顯皇后」呀。
examples.jyutping: "ci4 hei1" hai6 gaan2 cing1 lai4 gaa3, cyun4 meng2 hai6 me1 "haau3 jam1 ci4 hei1 dyun1 jau6 hong1 ji4 ciu1 jyu6 zong1 sing4 sau6 gung1 jam1 hin3 sung4 hei1 pui3 tin1 hing1 sing3 hin2 wong4 hau6" aa3.
examples.translation: Empress Ci Hei is just a short-name. Her full title is - oh I nearly forgot – "Empress Haau Jam Ci Hei Dyun Jau Hong Ji Ciu Jyu Zong Sing Sau Gung Jam Hin Sung Hei Pui Tin Hing Sing Hin".

senses.definition: 用嚟代替一啲唔想講出嚟（通常係唔適宜講明，可能係社會禁忌或者令人尷尬嘅）嘅字眼 (used as a euphemism to substitute something that one is unwilling to say (often something taboo, embarrassing, inappropriate, etc.))

examples.jyutping: nei5 tung4 keoi5 jau5 mou5 me1 dou3 aa3?
examples.translation: Did you do it with him?

senses.definition: 全稱疑問詞，意思係「所有」 (universal quantifier: "every")

examples.text: 呢間舖咁細，咩都冇得買嘅。
examples.jyutping: nei1 gaan1 pou3 gam3 sai3 me1 dou1 mou5 dak1 maai5 ge3.
examples.translation: This shop is too small. There's nothing to buy.

senses.definition: 瞓緊覺嗰陣喺半醒嘅情況之下做出一啲行為嘅#病，一般嚟講都會係一啲非常簡單嘅動作，例如坐起身，又或者周圍走動，而醒咗之後會唔係好記得之前發生過咩事 (sleepwalking; somnambulant)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 中華人民共和國嘅#少數民族 之一。主要分布喺東北嘅#吉林、#遼寧、同#黑龍江 三個省，其餘嘅好散咁分佈喺#河北、#新疆、同埋#甘肅 呢啲地方。佢哋嘅#語言，滿州話，屬滿－通古斯語系。除咗啲偏遠地區有啲滿族人用滿語之外，家吓佢哋普遍用漢語。 (The Manchu people (an ethnic minority of the PRC))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種香港賽馬會發行過嘅獎券，1977年停止發售；馬會首先會用攪珠抽出一堆入圍號碼，每個入圍號碼對應一場跑馬嘅其中一隻馬，再按照馬匹嘅排名決定獎金 (sweepstakes)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 唔正嘅；斜傾、偏向一邊；歪歪斜斜噉 (deviated from the vertical or horizontal; inclined to one side; slanted; like a lop-sided nail)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你啲字寫到歪零歪秤嘅，好肉酸啊。
examples.translation: Your handwriting slants to one side, it looks so ugly.

senses.definition: 通常以自己為第一身講嘅，用嚟話自己唔會白白浪費時間或精力喺一啲自己認為冇意義嘅事幹上高 (usually used in the first person; to describe the speaker never wants to waste time or energy on something himself or herself that the speaker feels meaningless)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 每次佢唔識做嗰啲嘢都掟比我哋做，由而家開始我唔會再理佢㗎喇，你要幫佢做就自己幫啦，我冇你咁好氣！
examples.translation: Whenever he encounters something he can't handle, he just passes it over to us. From now on, I will ignore him. If you want to help him, do it yourself; I won't waste my time on this.

senses.definition: 心理或者情感上有滿足嘅感覺 (sense of satisfaction)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多人都讚我攝影技巧好。佢哋嘅讚賞真係畀到好大滿足感我。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jan4 dou1 zaan3 ngo5 sip3 jing2 gei6 haau2 hou2. keoi5 dei6 ge3 zaan3 soeng2 zan1 hai6 bei2 dou2 hou2 daai6 mun5 zuk1 gam2 ngo5.
examples.translation: Many people commend my excellent photography skills, giving me great satisfaction.

senses.definition: 唔忿氣、條氣唔順 (to feel discontented)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你咩都唔知就批評佢，佢宜家好唔gur。
examples.jyutping: nei5 me1 dou1 m4 zi1 zau6 pai1 ping4 keoi5, keoi5 ji4 gaa1 hou2 m4 goe4.
examples.translation: You criticized him without understanding the situation, and now he feels very unhappy.

senses.definition: 用喺反問嘅句式，用嚟回應某人某事不如預期，一樣咁衰（句尾一定要係上升調） (a rhetorical construction that expresses how someone or certain things are, despite high expectation, is no different to the norm (always followed by a rising intonation at the end))
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: nei5 mai6 jau6 hai6 hei2 m4 dou2 san1?
examples.translation: You didn't get up on time either!

senses.definition: 唔想聽、聽唔入耳 (Don't want to hear it because don't like it)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢啲是是非非我冇耳聽啊。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 si6 si6 fei1 fei1 ngo5 mou5 ji5 teng1 aa3.
examples.translation: I don't want to listen to gossip.

senses.definition: 顯而易見；毫無疑問 (obviously; definitely)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 明明就係你錯，做乜唔認？
examples.jyutping: ming4 ming4 zau6 hai6 nei5 co3, zou6 mat1 m4 jing6?
examples.translation: It's obviously your fault, why don't you admit it?

senses.definition: 本義指女子再嫁，後引伸作同一件事做第二次 (originally means a woman married the second time, then the meaning extended to do a same thing twice. Literally: a plum tree blossoms for the second time)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 幼羚梅開二度，明年春天登記結婚。
examples.translation: Yau Ling likes a plum tree blossoms twice, she will get married again next year in spring.

senses.definition: 足球術語；指同一球員射入第二球 (soccer jargon, means the same player has goal twice in one match)

examples.text: 呢個球員今日表現唔錯，剛剛為球隊梅開二度。
examples.translation: This player performed quite well today, scoring two goals.

senses.definition: 記低、寫住重要事情 (to jot down or to mark down some important things)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 星期五約左你食飯嘛，我梗記得，mark低晒啦，枱都book埋喇。
examples.translation: We have a dinner date this Friday; I marked it in my calendar and already booked the table.

senses.definition: 揀；認定；喺愛情上認定另一半 (to mark; to pick)

examples.jyutping: nei5 maak1 hou2 bin1 jat6 zau6 waa6 ngo5 zi1 laa1.
examples.translation: Tell me the day you mark.

senses.definition: 進行球類運動嘅時候#睇實、#睇住 某個敵方球員防守球員不斷靠近纏繞敵方進攻球員，利用#腯身位 技巧，阻礙對方傳送、射球、走位，並伺機偷走個波阻斷攻勢。 (to man mark someone)

examples.text: 你過嚟做咩啫，你去mark佢啦！
examples.translation: Why are you here? Go and mark him!

senses.definition: 俾分，通常係指試卷 (to mark; to give marks; to give a score)

examples.jyutping: lou5 si1, nei5 maak1 co3 fan1 aa3.
examples.translation: Sir / Miss (teacher), you gave (someone) a wrong score.

senses.definition: 埋怨人唔叫埋自己參與 (a short form of blaming someone else for not counting the speaker in)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: aai2, jau6 m4 giu3.
examples.translation: Sigh, not inviting me again?

senses.definition: 用作攻擊或破壞嘅工具、裝置（量詞：件／個） (weapon; tool or object to attack)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gung1 gik1 sing3 mou5 hei3
examples.translation: offensive weapon

senses.definition: 比喻作可以為競爭帶嚟優勢嘅能力、手段 (means of gaining an advantage or defending oneself in a conflict or contest)

examples.text: 佢嘅眼淚係佢最大嘅武器。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 ngaan5 leoi6 hai6 keoi5 zeoi3 daai6 ge3 mou5 hei3.
examples.translation: Her tears are her biggest weapon.

senses.definition: 世界終結嘅日子，一般泛指生命結束或滅亡嘅日子 (doomsday; the last day (of the world, of lives))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sai3 gaai3 mut6 jat6
examples.translation: the end of the world

senses.definition: 引申指一啲嘢失勢、唔再流行或者存在嘅時候 (the end of something)

examples.translation: the end of corrupt officials

senses.definition: #眼、神經線、腦部受傷或有病變，令視力受損，最嚴重就睇唔到嘢 (blind)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: maang4 jan4
examples.translation: blind person

senses.definition: #樣衰、難睇嘅樣貌（量詞：個） (dumb face; bad-looking face; literally, cat face)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 睇你個貓樣，都唔慌有錢得去邊啦。
examples.jyutping: tai2 nei5 go3 maau1 joeng2, dou1 m4 fong1 jau5 cin2 dak1 heoi3 bin1 laa1.
examples.translation: With your shabby appearance, no one would expect you to be wealthy.

senses.definition: 量#米 嘅杯，一嘜米大概煮到兩碗飯。 (mug (of rice))
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: gam1 maan1 zyu2 gei2 do1 mak1 mai5 aa3?
examples.translation: How many cups of rice should we cook tonight?

senses.definition: 唔正嘅；斜傾、偏向一邊 (slanted; not tidy; not straight)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你啲字寫到歪歪斜斜嘅，好肉酸啊。
examples.translation: Your handwriting is quite slanted; it's quite unsightly.

senses.definition: 坐監 (to be imprisoned)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 有晒人證物證，今次你洗乾淨八月十五等踎監啦！
examples.jyutping: jau5 saai3 jan4 zing3 mat6 zing3, gam1 ci3 nei5 sai2 gon1 zeng6 baat3 jyut6 sap6 ng5 dang2 mau1 gaam1 laa1!
examples.translation: With all the witnesses and evidence against you, be prepared for a life behind bars!

senses.definition: #知；#明白、#了解 (to understand; to get the message)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 人家諗乜你都唔明解嘅！哼！
examples.jyutping: jan4 gaa1 nam2 mat1 nei5 dou1 m4 ming4 gaai2 ge2! hng1!
examples.translation: You don't know what's going on in my mind at all!

senses.definition: #咪高峰 嘅簡稱；要將聲音錄低或者放大聲量嗰陣，用嚟收音嘅電子器材（量詞：支） (mic; microphone)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baau3 mai1
examples.translation: audio clipping

senses.definition: 食完嘢計返消費總額；引申指食飯俾錢 (to pay the bill, usually after a meal in a restaurant)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 埋單嗰陣唔好俾咁多貼士啊。
examples.jyutping: maai4 daan1 go2 zan2 m4 hou2 bei2 gam3 do1 tip1 si2 aa3.
examples.translation: Don't tip too much when you pay the bill.

senses.definition: 為一啲事情負責任、承擔後果 (to take responsibility; to bear the consequences)

examples.text: 大個女喇，要記住你今日所做嘅事，第日都係要自己埋單㗎。
examples.jyutping: daai6 go3 neoi2 laa3, jiu3 gei3 zyu6 nei5 gam1 jat6 so2 zou6 ge3 si6, dai6 jat6 dou1 hai6 jiu3 zi6 gei2 maai4 daan1 gaa3.
examples.translation: You are a grown up girl now. Keep in mind that you will have to take responsibility for your actions from now on.

senses.definition: 殺死；引申指擊敗人，令人冇還擊之力、冇得翻身 (to kill; to murder; to finish off)

examples.text: 只要埋到佢身，我一拳就可以埋佢單。
examples.jyutping: zi2 jiu3 maai4 dou2 keoi5 san1, ngo5 jat1 kyun4 zau6 ho2 ji5 maai4 keoi5 daan1.
examples.translation: If I can get close to him, I can kill him in one punch.

senses.definition: 一種可以令人失去知覺、自我控制能力嘅藥物 (a drug which can make one lose his own control and even be unconscious)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lok6 mai4 joek6
examples.translation: to drug (a person)

senses.definition: 進行團體活動（例如卡牌遊戲或者打麻雀）時，唔夠玩家開始遊戲 (not enough players to start a game)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我哋打麻雀唔夠腳，你快啲過嚟啦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 daa2 maa4 zoek2 m4 gau3 goek3, nei5 faai3 di1 gwo3 lai4 laa1.
examples.translation: We are short on players for mahjong, come over over and take your spot.

phonetic.original: mou4 zin1 mou4 sin3 san4 sin1 naan4 bin3
jyutping: mou4 zin1 mou4 sin3 san4 sin1 naan4 bin3

senses.definition: 條件不足，技術再好都做唔到 (cannot make bricks without straw; cannot make a silk purse of a sow's ear; without sufficient conditions, one cannot do something even with excellent skills; literally, without a rug or a fan, a fairy cannot do the tricks)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你霎時間要我畫畫？筆都冇支喎。無氈無扇，神仙都難變啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 saap3 si4 gaan1 jiu3 ngo5 waak6 waa2? bat1 dou1 mou5 zi1 wo3. mou4 zin1 mou4 sin3, san4 sin1 dou1 naan4 bin3 laa1!
examples.translation: You want me to draw something right now? There isn't even a pen here. Even a fairy couldn't do tricks without proper tools.

keywords: mou4 zin1 mou4 sin3 san4 sin1 naan4 bin3
mou zin mou sin san sin naan bin

senses.definition: 大聲用粗口叫罵 (to swear; to be foul-mouthed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢份功課俾隻狗食咗，嘈到媽媽聲咁都無用。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 gung1 fo3 bei2 zek3 gau2 sik6 zo2, cou4 dou3 maa1 maa1 seng1 gam2 dou1 mou5 jung6.
examples.translation: His homework was eaten by a dog, rendering it irretrievable, no matter how loudly he complained.

senses.definition: 集中視線咁睇 (to look; to gaze)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你望下嗰個女仔，幾靚噉喎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 mong6 haa5 go2 go3 neoi5 zai2, gei2 leng3 gam2 wo3.
examples.translation: Hey, look at that girl. She's quite pretty.

senses.definition: 希望；指望 (to hope; to expect)

examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 mong6 zau6 mong6 keoi5 mou5 si6 laa1.
examples.translation: Now we can just hope that he's fine.

senses.definition: #唔知頭唔知路；通常攞嚟形容一個人唔清楚、唔認識一啲嘢，但係又傻吓傻吓噉走去做 (blindly; unthinkingly; often used to describe someone doing something (or following a trend) without the relevant understanding or knowledge)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: maang4 zung1 zung1 sei3 wai4 cung1

senses.definition: 情況差、唔理想，令人憂心、悲觀 ((of situations) desperate; unfavourable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你再係唔讀書唔得掂㗎喎！
examples.jyutping: nei5 zoi3 hai6 m4 duk6 syu1 m4 dak1 dim6 gaa3 wo3!
examples.translation: If you neglect your studies, you'll find yourself in a tough spot.

senses.definition: #畀、#付出 一樣嘢交換#得到 對方嘅錢、商品、財產、權利或者服務，形容「畀、付出」方面嘅行動 (to sell)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: maai6 ceot1 gaa3
examples.translation: selling rate

senses.definition: 一種中國傳統烹飪原料；用#芥菜 鹽醃風乾，有甜鹹兩種口味 (dried and pickled brown mustard, as a cooking ingredient)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋今晚食梅菜蒸豬肉。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 gam1 maan5 sik6 mui4 coi3 zing1 zyu1 juk6.
examples.translation: We had steamed pork with preserved mustard greens for dinner tonight.

senses.definition: 10000歲，同皇帝講嘢嗰陣專用嘅祝賀詞 (literally 'ten thousand years old', a phrase used to greet the emperor)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: maan6 seoi3 je4
examples.translation: the emperor

senses.definition: 好嘢；通常喺歡呼入面用 (great; a praise often used as an exclamation of joy)

examples.jyutping: lou5 baan2 maan6 seoi3!
examples.translation: Cheers for the boss!

senses.definition: 風水學上，指人嘅臉部五官；佢哋可以用嚟了解一個人嘅性格特質同運勢 ((Physiognomy in Fung Shui) human face; facial features)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: min6 soeng3 hok6
examples.translation: Physiognomy; face reading in Fung Shui

senses.definition: 指一件事預期可能會發生，而直到呢一刻都冇發生；已經、做咗嘅相反 (not yet; have not; did not)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我仲未食飯啊，而家好肚餓。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zung6 mei6 sik6 faan6 aa3, ji4 gaa1 hou2 tou5 ngo6.
examples.translation: I haven't had my meal yet, I feel so hungry now.

senses.definition: 用喺動詞短語後面，用嚟問一件事係咪完咗、做咗 (yet; used at the end of a question, to query whether an action is complete, or something is done)

examples.jyutping: gaau2 dim6 mei6 aa3?
examples.translation: Are you done yet?

senses.definition: 一隻語言由人整理出嚟嘅規則同系統，日常一般指時態、詞性等等改變字詞形態嘅規則，唔包括用字、語言習慣 (grammar of a language; usually refers to the rules that govern verb tenses, parts of speech, etc, as opposed to word choice or usage)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: man4 faat3 hok6 haau6
examples.translation: grammar school

senses.definition: 煤煙灰；煤經過燃燒之後嘅殘餘粉粒 (coal ash)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 uk1 gwai2 gam3 do1 mui4 si2.
examples.translation: There's so much soot in this house.

senses.definition: 臉色發紅 (face turns red; face flushes)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: nei5 min6 hung4 hung4 gam2 ge3? faat3 siu1 aa3?
examples.translation: You face looks red. Do you have a fever?

senses.definition: #理想、充滿好事；令人#愉悦、#滿足 (fine; glorious; happy; delightful; idyllic)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你呢個美好#願景 似乎唔會實現喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ni1 go3 mei5 hou2 jyun6 ging2 ci5 fu4 m4 wui2 sat6 jin6 laa3.
examples.translation: It seems that this idyllic vision of yours will not come true.

senses.definition: 形容女性體態修長 (slim; slender)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 睇佢身材突然咁窈窕，就知佢食咗減肥藥。
examples.jyutping: tai2 keoi5 san1 coi4 dat6 jin4 gam3 miu5 tiu5, zau6 zi1 keoi5 sik6 zo2 gaam2 fei4 joek6
examples.translation: Her sudden slim figure suggests she's taking weight-loss pills.

phonetic.original: mat1 je5 san1 si1 lo4 baak6 pei4
jyutping: mat1 je5 san1 si1 lo4 baak6 pei4

senses.definition: 話人自視過高，睇得自己太重要或者當自己係咩大人物嘅時候用 (an expression used to give someone a dressing-down for his arrogance, "who does he think he is?"; literally: what kind of new silk turnip skin)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 踩上門仲要串串貢咁款，你當你乜嘢新絲蘿蔔皮呀？
examples.translation: With all that arrogance on our turf, who do you think you are?

keywords: mat1 je5 san1 si1 lo4 baak6 pei4
mat je san si lo baak pei

senses.definition: 指文字工作者傾向言過其實，唔可以盡信 (men of letters, literates always have many pretty ways to tell a lie)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 依家好多大公司都揾作家寫#鱔稿 做宣傳，正所謂「文人多大話」，呢啲擦鞋文章有幾多成係真，未必個個分得清。
examples.translation: Nowadays, many big companies hire writers to write promotional articles full of cleverly disguised lies. It's hard for ordinary people to distinguish fact from fiction in these pieces.

senses.definition: 問一個人嘅背景資料或目的 (a question used to ask about someone's background or intentions, "who the hell is this person?")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 一陣講座條友究竟喺乜頭乜路？
examples.translation: Who is the speaker of this talk?

senses.definition: 俾船停泊，用嚟上落貨／客嘅地方（量詞：個） (pier; wharf; dock; quay)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sam1 seoi2 maa5 tau4
examples.translation: deepwater wharf

senses.definition: 身上展示財富嘅嘢 (items to display wealth)

examples.text: 他身上嘅碼頭真係厲害，戴嘅唔係「伯爵錶」就係「勞力士錶」。
examples.translation: The accessories he's wearing are so extravagant. If it's not a Piaget watch, it would be a Rolex.

senses.definition: 比喻#歸宿，好嘅愛情對象，通常係指有錢嘅對象 (right husband, right partner, usually referring to a rich person)

examples.text: 佢老公好有米，今次泊到個好碼頭啦！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 lou5 gung1 hou2 jau5 mai5, gam1 ci3 paak3 dou2 go3 hou2 maa5 tau4 laa1!
examples.translation: Her husband is wealthy, and she's found a dependable person!

senses.definition: 將機械錶機芯拆散，將零件放喺白電油洗走原有機油，加番新機油後再重新裝嵌 (to clean, lubricate mechanical watch)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 錶行建議用家每二至五年就拎隻錶去原廠抹油。
examples.translation: The bank recommends having your watch serviced at the original factory every two to five years.

senses.definition: 動作慢 ((of one's pace of doing things) slow and clumsy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你咁咪嚒，天光都未有得食啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 mi1 mo1, tin1 gwong1 dou1 mei6 jau5 dak1 sik6 laa1.
examples.translation: Given your slow pace, it's going to take forever to prepare the meal.

senses.definition: 做咗一啲會懾服對方嘅嘢，然後向對方示威並取笑嘅一句説話，意思係問人服唔服輸 (After doing something that can submit the opponent, then say this as a demonstration and teasing, the meaning is "do you admit your failure ?", "do you submit to me ?". Literally: ask you die or not)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我一早預左你咁問，所以揾定晒資料去答，問你死未？
examples.translation: I anticipated your question and prepared all the data to answer it. I've snagged you this time!

senses.definition: 唔好#應承；唔好噉做 (to not be willing to; to not agree; not to do)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wui6 sei2 gaa3, mai5 zai3 tim1 aa3 nei5.
examples.translation: You will die! Don't consent to it!

senses.definition: 詞牌名，其中一首最出名嘅詞係相傳由宋代#岳飛 所填《滿江紅 ‧ 寫懷》 (set of tone names for which poems to be composed, the most famous one is composed by Ngok Fei (Yue Fei) in Song Dynasty called "To Write My Heart".Literally: full river red)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 比喻考試成績非常差，大部份科目唔合格(以紅色表示)，成績表一片紅色。 (figuratively very bad performance in the exam, as most of the subjects are failed(the grade to be written in red colour), the school report looks almost all red.)

examples.text: 究竟你有冇温書架？點解次次考試都滿江紅架？
examples.jyutping: gau3 ging2 nei5 jau5 mou5 wan1 syu1 gaa3, dim2 gaai2 ci3 ci3 haau2 si5 dou1 mun5 gong1 hung4 gaa3?
examples.translation: Did you study for the test? Why do you keep getting red marks on your report card?

senses.definition: 形容男人粗魯、猥瑣、邋遢，同時亦可以用嚟形容比較粗豪、行為舉止似男人嘅女人 (unrefined in behaviour)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 喺公園嗰度成日都有班麻甩佬喺度大大聲噉捉棋。
examples.jyutping: hai2 gung1 jyun2 go2 dou6 sing4 jat6 dou1 jau5 baan1 maa4 lat1 lou2 hai2 dou6 daai6 daai6 seng1 gam2 zuk1 kei2
examples.translation: There are often groups of unkempt men playing chess loudly in the park.

senses.definition: 利用較低温度長時間加熱噉煮 (slow cooking)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zan1 hung1 dai1 wan1 maan6 zyu2
examples.translation: sous-vide

senses.definition: 一種#昆蟲，曉飛；通常公嘅以吸食植物汁液維生，乸嘅會吸動物嘅血，喺吸血嗰陣可能會傳播病菌，所以畀人認定係一種#害蟲（量詞：隻） (mosquito)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 快啲拍死隻蚊啦，唔係又俾佢針㗎喇。

senses.definition: 英文 "mile" 音譯。以前英制時期以 #英里 做單位，所以喺揸車嘅時候會用「咪」嚟做車速嘅量詞。而家嘅車同路牌已經改晒用#公里 做單位，但因為習慣咗，所以大家口頭上繼續用「咪」嚟形容車速。而家揸車嘅人所講嘅「咪」係指公里。 (previously referred to a mile (1.609344 kilometers) but currently to kilometres per hour or kilometres on a milestone; it is a transliteration of "mile" in English; in the old days of the imperial system, miles were used as a unit, so when driving a car, 咪 mai1 was used as a unit of speed; this has since changed, with cars and road signs now using kilometres, however everyone continues to use 咪 mai1 out of habit)

senses.definition: 比喻#百厭#奀皮 嘅#細路（量詞：隻） (naughty kid)

examples.jyutping: lat1 sing2 maa5 lau1
examples.translation: a very naughty child out of control; literally: a loose string monkey

senses.definition: 籃球術語；卡位、搶籃板 (box out)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 孭位要再練多啲，再紮實啲。

senses.definition: #昆蟲 嘅一種；常用作爬行動物、鳥類同魚類嘅飼料 (superworm)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 「生猛蟲蟲愛心飯盒」，由新鮮嘅麥皮蟲，同埋香噴噴嘅白飯所製成。
examples.jyutping: "saang1 maang5 cung4 cung2 ngoi3 sam1 faan6 haap2", jau4 san1 sin1 ge3 mak6 pei4 cung4, tung4 maai4 hoeng1 pan3 pan3 ge3 baak6 faan6 so2 zai3 sing4.
examples.translation: Lively worm lunchbox crafted with love" is made from fresh superworms and fragrant white rice.

senses.definition: 一種畀#貓 爬高嘅#傢俬 (cat tree)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 諗住買貓樹畀隻貓玩，點知佢鍾意玩個貓樹紙盒多啲。
examples.jyutping: nam2 zyu6 maai5 maau1 syu6 bei2 zek3 maau1 waan2, dim2 zi1 keoi5 zung1 ji3 waan2 go3 maau1 syu6 zi2 haap2 do1 di1.
examples.translation: I thought my cat would like the new cat tree, turned out she liked the cardboard more.

senses.definition: 就算做咗都冇損失、做嚟都無妨，但亦都冇咩特別嘅益處 (harmless (to do something))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: si3 haa3 sin1 mou5 waai6.
examples.translation: It doesn't hurt to try first.

senses.definition: 為事件負責；帶領人做某件事，並為件事負責任 (to take responsibility; to be answerable; literally, to carry the ticket)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 大家小心啲搬呀，啲嘢爛咗我要孭飛㗎！
examples.jyutping: daai6 gaa1 siu2 sam1 di1 bun1 aa3, di1 je5 laan6 zo2 ngo5 jiu3 me1 fei1 gaa3!
examples.translation: Please be careful moving things around. If you break something, I'm responsible.

senses.definition: 喺表演、電影或電視節目入面主演，吸引觀眾 (to be a sell-out attraction, to be the star attraction; to guarantee heavy sales of tickets by one's presence in a show)

examples.text: 呢個節目咁多年嚟都係有佢孭飛先有咁高收視咋！
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 zit3 muk6 gam3 do1 nin4 lai4 dou1 hai6 jau5 keoi5 me1 fei1 sin1 jau5 gam3 gou1 sau1 si6 zaa3!
examples.translation: This TV show has had such a high audience rating over the years only because of him.

senses.definition: 認領一定數量嘅飛，賣晒出去，確保有人出席 (to be responsible for the sale of a certain amount of tickets; to ensure that tickets sell out and/or people attend)

examples.text: 細劇團冇咁多錢落廣告，人人都要孭飛，用自己嘅關係網幫手宣傳。
examples.jyutping: sai3 kek6 tyun4 mou5 gam3 do1 cin2 lok6 gwong2 gou3, jan4 jan4 dou1 jiu3 me1 fei1, jung6 zi6 gei2 ge3 gwaan1 hai6 mong5 bong1 sau2 syun1 cyun4.
examples.translation: Small drama troupes cannot afford advertisements, so everyone is responsible for promoting their shows through their own social networks.

senses.definition: #蜜蜂 嘅巢，用嚟居住同儲存#蜂蜜，通常由大量嘅#六角形 房組成（量詞：個） (beehive)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松走去搞個蜜蜂竇話想偷蜜糖，結果畀群蜜蜂針到佢成塊面腫嗮。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 zau2 heoi3 gaau2 go3 mat6 fung1 dau3 waa6 soeng2 tau1 mat6 tong4, git3 gwo2 bei2 kwan4 mat6 fung1 zam1 dou3 keoi5 seng4 faai3 min6 zung2 saai3.
examples.translation: A-chung messed with that beehive saying that he wants to steal some honey. He ended up being stung so heavily that his face is all swollen.

senses.definition: 起源於中國嘅傳統麪食，用#麪粉 同#水 按比例溝埋發酵再蒸製而成嘅食物（量詞：個／嚿） (Chinese steamed bun)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #煙霞 (smog)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 認真望住個目標，盡力確保（某樣嘢）會射中 (To aim (some kind of projectiles) at)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿松佢學人玩射擊但係又唔識瞄準，結果粒子彈打中嚿石仲彈返轉頭。而家佢入咗醫院。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 keoi5 hok6 jan4 waan2 se6 gik1 daan6 hai6 jau6 m4 sik1 miu4 zeon2, git3 gwo2 lap1 zi2 daan2 daa2 zung3 gau6 sek6 zung6 daan6 faan1 zyun3 tau4. ji4 gaa1 keoi5 jap6 zo2 ji1 jyun2.
examples.translation: A-chung is learning to shoot but he can't aim. As a result his bullet hit a rock and bounced back. Now he's in the hospital.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
做唔到某樣嘢 (cannot do something)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: hou2 baau2, sik6 m4 lok6 laa3.
examples.translation: I'm so full that I can't eat anymore.

senses.definition: 最高；極致；再冇任何嘢高級過、勁過或者好過佢 (supreme; highest; ultimate)
senses.label: 區別詞

senses.definition: 熱愛某樣嘢嘅人（量詞：個） ((of people) fan; enthusiast)

examples.jyutping: maan6 waa2 mai4
examples.translation: comic fan

senses.definition: #魚膠 (gelatin)

senses.definition: 唔夠；仲想要多啲；用嚟形容慾望未得到滿足 (not enough; left wanting for more; used to suggest that a person's desires have yet to be sated)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我食咗一碟炒飯，兩件蛋撻，再加多杯雪糕，但係都仲未夠喉。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 sik6 zo2 jat1 dip6 caau2 faan6, loeng5 gin6 daan6 taat1, zoi3 gaa1 do1 bui1 syut3 gou1, daan6 hai6 dou1 zung6 mei6 gau3 hau4
examples.translation: I devoured one plate of fried rice, two egg tarts, and a cup of ice cream, but was only left hungry for more.

examples.text: 佢好鍾意喺講緊認真嘢嗰陣，講啲無厘啦更嘅嘢。

examples.translation: Returning after living overseas for ten years, I realised that Hong Kong was no longer the place I used to know.

發生#戴綠帽 嘅情況，諧音「冇事」 (wordplay on #戴綠帽 and (near) homophone of 冇事 "no problem"; essentially suggesting that one's female partner might have had sexual relationships with other people; literally: hat issue)

examples.text: 你老婆成日好夜先返屋企？帽事嘅 :)
examples.jyutping: nei5 lou5 po4 seng4 jat6 hou2 je6 sin1 faan1 uk1 kei5? mou2 si6 ge3.
examples.translation: You say your wife always return home late? Don't worry, it's not a problem (sarcastically) :)

senses.definition: 一種朱古力麥芽飲品 (Milo)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 飲番杯美祿嚟提下神先。
examples.jyutping: jam2 faan1 bui1 mei5 luk6 lai4 tai4 haa5 san4 sin1.
examples.translation: I need a Milo to boost my energy levels.

senses.definition: 朦到睇唔清楚個樣 (blurred (face))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 打印證件相，點知出咗張面目模糊嘅靈異相片。
examples.jyutping: daa2 jan3 zing3 gin2 soeng2, dim2 zi1 ceot1 zo2 zoeng1 min6 muk6 mou4 wu4 ge3 ling4 ji6 soeng3 pin2.
examples.translation: When I printed my ID photo, I didn't expect to get a blurry and eerie headshot.

senses.definition: 由國際單位制導出#速度 嘅基本單位，每一#秒 行一#米 嘅情況 (metre per second, m/s)
senses.label: 量詞

senses.definition: 顏色；帶有淺#黃色 嘅#白色；#忌廉、#米 嘅顏色 (beige; cream colour)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 尷尬 (embarrassed)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: bei2 jan4 naau6 dou3 min6 mung2 mung2

senses.definition: 表情麻木、呆滯 (expressionless; stony-faced)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 睇佢面木木噉，係咪屋企有啲咩事發生？
examples.jyutping: tai2 keoi5 min6 muk6 muk6 gam2, hai6 mai5 uk1 kei2 jau5 di1 me1 si6 faat3 sang1?
examples.translation: Look at his poker face. Did anything happen in his family?

senses.definition: #毛骨悚然 (sending chills down one's spine)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 齣恐怖片嚇到我毛管戙篤企。
examples.jyutping: ceot1 hung2 bou3 pin2 haak3 dou3 ngo5 mou4 gun2 dung6 duk1 kei5.
examples.translation: The horror movie sends a chill down my spine.

senses.definition: 隨時、不分晝夜 (anytime)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 mou4 si4 mou4 hau6 dou1 wui5 lai4 gaa3.
examples.translation: He'll come at any time.

senses.definition: 冇咁嘅心情同精力 (to be not in the mood)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dou1 mou5 hei3 tung4 nei5 gong2 gam3 do1.
examples.translation: I'm not in the mood to explain it to you now.

senses.definition: 任性，唔成熟；冇出息 (immature; good-for-nothing)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: gam3 daai6 go3 zai2 dou1 zung6 m4 saang1 sing3.
examples.translation: He's not a kid anymore but he still acts like one.

senses.definition: 快手、迅速、敏捷 (dexterous; deft)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zou6 je5 hou2 maa4 lei6 gaa3.
examples.translation: He is very efficient at work.

senses.definition: 比喻好冇方向噉亂衝亂撞 (someone who runs around like a headless chicken)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 睇佢成隻冇頭烏蠅噉，要舂去邊啊？
examples.jyutping: tai2 keoi5 seng4 zek3 mou5 tau4 wu1 jing1 gam2, jiu3 zung1 heoi3 bin1 aa3?
examples.translation: He is running around like a headless chicken. Where is he headed?

senses.definition: 比唔上，#不及 (do not compare with something; can’t compare with something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 道路再顛簸，都唔及我依家個心咁亂。
examples.jyutping: dou6 lou6 zoi3 din1 bo3, dou1 m4 kap6 ngo5 ji1 gaa1 go3 sam1 gam3 lyun6.
examples.translation: Bumpy though the journey is, nothing can compare with my confusion right now.

phonetic.original: mou5 ni1 zi1 go1 zai2 coeng3:mou5 nei1 zi1 go1 zai2 coeng3
jyutping: mou5 ni1 zi1 go1 zai2 coeng3
mou5 nei1 zi1 go1 zai2 coeng3

senses.definition: 比喻過去某件事（通常係指好嘅事）唔會再有；好景不再 (something (usually something good) no longer true due to change of circumstances; literally, a song sung no more)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 而家經濟咁差，冇升職加薪呢支歌仔唱㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 ging1 zai3 gam3 caa1, mou5 sing1 zik1 gaa1 san1 ni1 zi1 go1 zai2 coeng3 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: Nowadays the economic situation is so poor. Benefits like promotion or getting a rise are no longer viable.

senses.definition: 比喻過去可行嘅方法而家行唔通 (used to describe that a method used in the past no longer works due to change of circumstances)

examples.text: 唔好再信勤力讀書就考到5**，冇呢支歌仔唱㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 zoi3 seon3 kan4 lik6 duk6 syu1 zau6 haau2 dou2 ng5 sing1 sing1, mou5 ni1 zi1 go1 zai2 coeng3 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: Stop believing that paying efforts will lead to getting Level 5**. This strategy will not work anymore.
