senses.definition: 冇咁嘅#福氣 去享受、承受某種#福利 或好嘅嘢，有時用嚟表達拒絕或諷刺 (do not have such luck to enjoy)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你嘅恩惠，我實在無福消受。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ge3 jan1 wai6, ngo5 sat6 zoi6 mou4 fuk1 siu1 sau6.
examples.translation: I really don't deserve your kindness.

senses.definition: 粒聲唔出、唔張揚 (without making a sound, without making a fuss)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你做咩唔聲唔氣噉坐喺角落度阿？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 me1 m4 seng1 m4 hei3 gam2 co5 hai2 gok3 lok1 dou6 aa3?
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Why are you sitting in the corner without saying anything?

senses.definition: 形容人動作慢吞吞、唔靈活 (dilatory; sluggish)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zou6 je5 hou2 mo1 to4 gaa3.
examples.translation: He is a laggard.

senses.definition: 形容個天有薄雲，有時會有陽光穿過 ((of the sky) bright; well-lit; under thin cloud cover with occasional sunshine)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: jat6 gaan1 tin1 sik1 ming4 long5.
examples.translation: There were bright periods during the day.

senses.definition: 事情來龍去脈變得清楚 (clear; obvious)

examples.jyutping: bat1 ming4 long5 jan1 sou3
examples.translation: uncertain factors; uncertainty

senses.definition: 夢入面嘅世界 (world inside dream)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 夢入面嘅景物 (scene or sight of a dream)
表示一個要求或者一樣嘢唔會構成障礙或者帶來任何不便 (no problem)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我橫掂聽日都放假，今晚夜啲走都冇問題。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 waang4 dim6 ting1 jat6 dou1 fong3 gaa3, gam1 maan5 je6 di1 zau2 dou1 mou5 man6 tai4.
examples.translation: Anyway I'll be on leave tomorrow, (so) it won't be a problem (for me) if I leave a little later tonight.

senses.definition: 用#木 做鞋底嘅#鞋 (clogs)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲人去荷蘭旅行，通常都會買對木屐做紀念品。
examples.jyutping: di1 jan4 heoi3 ho2 laan1 leoi5 hang4, tung1 soeng4 dou1 wui5 maai5 deoi3 muk6 kek6 zou6 gei2 nim6 ban2.
examples.translation: When people visit Holland, they often buy a pair of clogs as souvenirs.

senses.definition: 手槍嘅扳機。咁叫係因為發音近似#普通話 嘅「扳機」。 (Literally "pull cock", figuratively "the trigger of a gun".)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺美國要攞槍牌一定要學識點操作條扳雞。
examples.jyutping: hai2 mei5 gwok3 jiu3 lo2 coeng1 paai4 jat1 ding6 jiu3 hok6 sik1 dim2 cou1 zok3 tiu4 maan1 gai1.
examples.translation: In the USA, if you want to get a gun license, then you must first learn how to control a gun's trigger.

senses.definition: 形容事物冇乜#益處，甚至可能有比較輕微嘅害處 (not beneficial and maybe even a bit harmful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ling4 sik6 deoi3 nei5 san1 tai2 mou5 jik1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Snacks are bad for your health.

senses.definition: #病 咗；#身體#不適 (not feeling well)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 jat6 m4 syu1 fuk6.
examples.translation: I don't feel well today.

senses.definition: #迷人 嘅特質；能夠吸引人嘅力量（量詞：種） (charm; glamour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一個正常男人冇可能抗拒施嘉莉祖安遜嘅非凡魅力。
examples.jyutping: jat1 go3 zing3 soeng4 naam4 jan2 mou5 ho2 nang4 kong3 keoi5 si1 gaa1 lei6 zou2 on1 seon3 ge3 fei1 faan4 mei6 lik6.
examples.translation: An ordinary man can't possibly resist the unusual charm of Scarlett Johansson.

senses.definition: #互聯網 入面區分唔同領域嘅稱呼；例如「google.com」係屬於Google嘅網域；同「#網站」嘅分別係網域唔止單指網頁服務，仲可以包括其他服務同用途 (domain (on the Internet))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zyu3 caak3 mong5 wik6
examples.translation: to register a domain

senses.definition: 微軟Windows系統嘅網絡群組 (a domain of Microsoft Windows active directory)

examples.text: 我加咗你部電腦入公司個網域喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gaa1 zo2 nei5 bou6 din6 nou5 jap6 gung1 si1 go3 mong5 wik6 laa3.
examples.translation: I've added your computer into company's active directory domain.

senses.definition: 形容壓抑住憤怒或不滿而#面色 陰沉嘅樣 ((of facial expression) irritated; angry; literally: face scorched)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你見佢咁面燶，就知自己講錯嘢啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gin3 keoi5 gam3 min6 nung1, zau6 zi1 zi6 gei2 gong2 co3 je5 laa1.
examples.translation: Looking at his irritated face, you should've understood that you said something wrong.

senses.definition: 原本指一種喺花園嘅#建築物，設計上由一個入口行到終點，途中有好多#分叉路 同#倔頭路；而家通常喺#遊樂場、#嘉年華 見到，或者喺紙上、電子遊戲中同概念嘅玩法（量詞：個） (maze; labyrinth)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松喺個迷宮入面蕩失路。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 hai2 go3 mai4 gung1 jap6 min6 dong6 sat1 lou6.
examples.translation: A-chung got lost in the maze.

senses.definition: 比賽、賭博用嘅馬；會用嚟借指賭馬呢個活動 (a racehorse; or sometimes, horse-betting)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你今次買馬仔贏唔少啦？
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam1 ci3 maai5 maa5 zai2 jeng4 m4 siu2 laa1?
examples.translation: You won a lot from this horse race, didn't you?

senses.definition: 比喻#部下（量詞：個） (a junior employee; a subordinate; literally, pony)

examples.text: 我聽日揾幾個馬仔過嚟幫你手。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ting1 jat6 wan2 gei2 go3 maa5 zai2 gwo3 lei4 bong1 nei5 sau2.
examples.translation: I am sending a few juniors over to help you out tomorrow.

senses.definition: #薩其馬，一種源自滿州嘅甜品；係一種用雞蛋同麪粉整，切到四四方方嘅甜點（量詞：嚿／件） (Sachima, a Manchurian pastry)
非常細、微小；唔重要、微不足道嘅 (tiny; paltry; negligible; insignificant)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 人同大自然嘅力量相比，係幾咁渺小。
examples.jyutping: jan4 tung4 daai6 zi6 jin4 ge3 lik6 loeng6 soeng1 bei2, hai6 gei2 gam3 miu5 siu2.
examples.translation: Man's strength is very insignificant when compared to that of nature.

senses.definition: 撇甩一個唔想佢跟埋嚟、黐埋嚟嘅人，離佢遠啲 (to get rid of, to escape from, or to "shake off" a pursuer or an unwanted companion)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 去同一度旅行又跟埋嚟，推佢又唔係，又成日問呢樣問嗰樣，好煩啊！賣甩佢食宵唞下氣好過啦！
examples.jyutping: heoi3 tung4 jat1 dou6 leoi5 hang4 jau6 gan1 maai4 lei4, teoi1 keoi5 jau6 m4 hai6, jau6 seng4 jat6 man6 ni1 joeng6 man6 go2 joeng6, hou2 faan4 aa3! maai6 lat1 keoi5 sik6 siu1 tau2 haa5 hei3 hou2 gwo3 laa1!
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]Going on a trip with someone and having to deal with their constant questions and complaints is so annoying! I'd rather sell them some street food and be done with it.

senses.definition: 物質喺#口 入面刺激#味蕾 嘅感受；#味道（量詞：種／隻） (taste; flavour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hou2 mei6
examples.translation: (of) good taste; tasty

senses.definition: #嗅覺 嘅感受；#聞 到嘅嘢；#除；#氣味（量詞：種/陣） (smell; odour; aroma)

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 mei6
examples.translation: fragrance

senses.definition: #觀感；#印象；#風格；帶畀人嘅感覺 (perception; impression; style)

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 mei6
examples.translation: Hong Kong's characteristics

senses.definition: #意味；情味；深層意思或者感情 (implication; connotation; feeling; emotion)

examples.jyutping: jan4 cing4 mei6
examples.translation: compassion; human warmth

senses.definition: 不停咁講，一路講落去；通常用喺形容生動、感人嘅講話 (to speak continuously while often vividly or touchingly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 事件嘅始末，就要聽佢娓娓道來喇。
examples.jyutping: si6 gin2 ge3 ci2 mut6, zau6 jiu3 teng1 keoi5 mei5 mei5 dou6 loi4 laa3.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]We need to hear the whole story from him.

senses.definition: #技藝 仲未成熟 (literally "not yet home", figuratively "not yet close to mastery", used to describe a person's skills.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 阿松喺度#吹水 話自己係廚神，但係見佢煮碟#乾炒牛河 都差啲搞到#火燭 就知佢根本未到家啦。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 hai2 dou6 ceoi1 seoi2 waa6 zi6 gei2 hai6 cyu4 san4, daan6 hai6 gin3 keoi5 zyu2 dip6 gon1 caau2 ngau4 ho2 dou1 caa1 di1 gaau2 dou3 fo2 zuk1 zau6 zi1 keoi5 gan1 bun2 mei6 dou3 gaa1 laa1.
examples.translation: A-chung was bragging about being a god of cooking, but I knew he's not even close when he almost caused a fire when making a plate of beef chow fun.

senses.definition: 用儀器同資料嚟扮現實嘅情況，可以作為訓練，或者預測將來 (to simulate; to imitate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jung6 din6 nou5 mou4 ji4 tin1 hei3 bin3 faa3
examples.translation: to simulate the change of weather on a computer

senses.definition: 眼球接收光線較差嘅範圍；視網膜上冇感光細胞嘅部分（量詞：個） (scotoma; blind spot)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 留意唔到嘅嘢 (somewhere or something one cannot see)

examples.text: 呢個盲點好多司機都睇唔到，行到嗰度小心啲。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 maang4 dim2 hou2 do1 si1 gei1 dou1 tai2 m4 dou2, haang4 dou3 go2 dou6 siu2 sam1 di1.
examples.translation: Many drivers can't see this blind spot, be careful when you drive past there.

senses.definition: 諗極都諗唔到、理解唔到嘅觀點或範疇 (something that one cannot understand; an area or subject about which one is uninformed, prejudiced, or unappreciative)

examples.text: 華生，你又突破盲點喇，案情又有新進展。
examples.jyutping: waa4 sang1, nei5 jau6 dat6 po3 maang4 dim2 laa3, on3 cing4 jau6 jau5 san1 zeon3 zin2.
examples.translation: Watson, you manage to see past the blind spot again, this case is moving forward.

senses.definition: 鍛鍊、考驗 (to temper oneself)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 年青人要喺社會做事，磨練吓自己先至會成長嘅。
examples.jyutping: nin4 cing1 jan4 jiu3 hai2 se5 wui2 zou6 si6, mo4 lin6 haa5 zi6 gei2 sin1 zi3 wui3 sing4 zoeng2 ge3.
examples.translation: For young people to become adults they need to work in society so as to temper themselves.

senses.definition: 形容法官、執法人員判案公正，執法時嚴明而無私 ((of judges and officials) to judge fairly, impartially; literally: bright mirror high hung)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 法官判案嘅時候明鏡高懸，絕對唔會有任何偏頗。
examples.jyutping: faat3 gun1 pun3 on3 ge3 si4 hau6 ming4 geng3 gou1 jyun4, zyut6 deoi3 m4 wui5 jau5 jam6 ho4 pin1 po2.
examples.translation: Judges make judgement impartially, without bias absolutely.

senses.definition: 左右邊各紮一條#辮，如果條辮係馬尾嘅話又會叫#雙馬尾 (pigtails)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zaat3 maa1 bin1 go2 zan2 hou2 ho2 oi3!
examples.translation: She looks so cute with pigtails!

senses.definition: 一個人生命裏面注定嘅經歷同方向 (fate; destiny)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zip3 sau6 ming6 wan6 ge3 on1 paai4
examples.translation: to accept fate's arrangement

senses.definition: 取笑人係#懦夫 嘅講法 (coward; bunch of cowards)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 過山車都唔夠薑玩，正一冇膽匪類。
examples.jyutping: gwo3 saan1 ce1 dou1 m4 gau3 goeng1 waan2, zing3 jat1 mou5 daam2 fei2 leoi2.
examples.translation: What a coward. You can't even ride a roller coaster.

senses.definition: 一種大型轉輪狀觀景用嘅機械設施，輪邊吊住畀乘客坐嘅車廂（量詞：個／座） (Ferris wheel; observation wheel)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoi2 pong4 jau5 hou2 daai6 zo2 mo1 tin1 leon4.
examples.translation: On the seafront there is a big observation wheel.

senses.definition: #貓 嘅#觸鬚（量詞：條／執） (cat whiskers)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 貓鬚能夠測量障礙物有幾高、幾闊。
examples.jyutping: maau1 sou1 nang4 gau3 cak1 loeng4 zoeng3 ngoi6 mat6 jau5 gei2 gou1 gei2 fut3
examples.translation: Whiskers of cats can measure how tall and deep obstacles are.

senses.definition: 拖長嚟講，表示遲疑 (used to express hesitation with a prolonged pronunciation)
senses.label: 感嘆詞

examples.jyutping: m6 ... dung3 ling2 caa4 aa1 m4 goi1.
examples.translation: Um... iced lemon tea please.

senses.definition: 表示樂意答允 (used to express that the speaker is pleased to agree)

examples.text: 甲：「聖誕食大餐好唔好啊？」乙：「嗯！」
examples.jyutping: sing3 daan3 sik6 daai6 caan1 hou2 m4 hou2 aa3? m6!
examples.translation: A: Shall we have a great Christmas meal? B: Great!

senses.definition: 一種特別編定過、改變原文次序，令其他人難以理解嘅秘密數碼，以防一旦被敵方截查到知悉內容；可以分為密本與密表兩種（量詞：組） (cipher)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 已故英國科學家圖靈，二戰期間協助破解納粹德軍密碼。
examples.jyutping: ji5 gu3 jing1 gwok3 fo1 hok6 gaa1 tou4 ling4, ji6 zin3 kei4 gaan1 hip3 zo6 po3 gaai2 naap6 seoi5 dak1 gwan1 mat6 maa5.
examples.translation: The late British scientist Alan Turing had helped to crack the German's cipher during World War Two.

senses.definition: 進入系統嘅時候用嚟證明用户身份嘅字符組合（量詞：個） (password; passcode; secret code)

examples.jyutping: ding6 kei4 goi2 mat6 maa5 aa3.
examples.translation: Change your password on a regular basis.

senses.definition: 力度好大；形勢好強 (fierce; vigorous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: maang5 lit6 ge3 taai3 joeng4
examples.translation: very shiny sun

senses.definition: 唔聽話、唔聽教、唔聽指揮 (disobedient)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 大家都唔聽笛，我可以點？
examples.jyutping: daai6 gaa1 dou1 m4 teng1 dek2, ngo5 ho2 ji5 dim2?
examples.translation: Everyone just ignores my orders; what can I do?

senses.definition: 唔關事嘅，責任唔喺佢度嘅 (innocent; blameless)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢係無辜㗎，要怪就怪我啦！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai6 mou4 gu1 gaa3, jiu3 gwaai3 zau6 gwaai3 ngo5 laa1!
examples.translation: He is innocent. If you need someone to blame, blame me!

senses.definition: 唔好彩受到牽連嘅 (negatively affected by something outside of one's control; innocent)

examples.text: 佢想去勸開佢哋唔好打交，點知俾佢打咗一拳，真係無辜啊！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 soeng2 heoi3 hyun3 hoi1 keoi5 dei6 m4 hou2 daa2 gaau1, dim2 zi1 bei2 keoi5 daa2 zo2 jat1 kyun4, zan1 hai6 mou4 gu1 aa3!
examples.translation: He wanted to urge them not to fight, but unexpectedly caught a fist. Who could blame him!

senses.definition: 無成功嘅可能或者機會、無希望 (to have no chance; to have no hope)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你睇我又肥又矮，選港姐我實冇行。
examples.jyutping: nei5 tai2 ngo5 jau6 fei4 jau6 ai2, syun2 gong2 ze2 ngo5 sat6 mou5 hong4.
examples.translation: You see I'm both fat and short, it's impossible for me to join the Miss Hong Kong competition.

senses.definition: 精神狀態唔太好 (absent-minded)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢琴晚好夜瞓，搞到冇厘精神。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 kam4 maan5 hou2 je6 fan3, gaau2 dou3 mou5 lei4 zing1 san4.
examples.translation: He went to sleep very late last night so he is absent-minded now.

senses.definition: 為咗揾嘢（實物，例如物件、道路），用手去摸 ((with one's hands) to feel about; to grope)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 屋企停電嘅話，我要用手摸索離開間房嘅路。
examples.jyutping: uk1 kei2 ting4 din6 ge3 waa6, ngo5 jiu3 jung6 sau2 mo2 sok3 lei4 hoi1 gaan1 fong2 ge3 lou6.
examples.translation: If the flat's power went out, I would need to feel my way out of the room.

senses.definition: （做事嘅方向、正確答案等）尋找；尋求；揾 (to try to figure out)

examples.text: 爸爸買咗部新嘅智能電話，摸索緊點自拍。
examples.jyutping: baa4 baa1 maai5 zo2 bou6 san1 ge3 zi3 nang4 din6 waa2, mo2 sok3 gan2 dim2 zi6 paak3.
examples.translation: Dad bought a new smartphone and is trying to figure out how to take a selfie.

senses.definition: 人哋多謝你之後，向人表達返#唔使客氣、無乜#大不了 (after someone express thankful to you, reply as "you're welcome", "not at all", "no big deal" or "it doesn't matter")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 甲：「唔該晒你呀！」乙：「乜説話吖，舉手之勞啫。」
examples.jyutping: gaap3: m4 goi1 saai3 nei5 aa3! jyut3: mat1 syut3 waa6 aa1, geoi2 sau2 zi1 lou4 ze1.
examples.translation: A: "Thank you so much!" B: "You're welcome. It's not a great deal.

senses.definition: 棉質條狀嘅女性衞生用品，放入陰道以吸收經血。 (tampon, a feminine hygiene product used to absorb menstrual flow by inserting it in one's vagina.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你鍾意用M巾定棉條多啲？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zung1 ji3 jung6 em1 gan1 ding6 min4 tiu2 do1 di1?
examples.translation: Which do you prefer? Sanitary napkins or tampons?

senses.definition: （決策、決定）聰明；有智慧 ((of decisions) sensible; wise)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你唔理佢係明智嘅決定。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 lei5 keoi5 hai6 ming4 zi3 ge3 kyut3 ding6.
examples.translation: It's wise to ignore him.

senses.definition: #漢族 嘅各個派系；佢哋之間嘅語言文化差異大到好似歐洲各國嘅咁，但係同樣對華夏文明有認同感（量詞：個） (Subgroup of Han Chinese)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 廣府民系係講廣東話嘅漢民系，佢哋係廣東、香港、同埋澳門嘅主要族群。
examples.translation: The Cantonese people are the Han subgroup that speaks Cantonese. They are the main group in Guangdong, Hong Kong, and Macau.

senses.definition: 亂咁鬧 (to hurl (verbal) abuses; to participate in mudslinging)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: maan6 maa6 mou5 zo6 lei5 sing3 tou2 leon6.
examples.translation: Mud-sligging does not help in sensible debate.

senses.definition: 鋪滿山丘同田野，形容數量多 (all over the mountain and plains)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: maan6 saan1 pin3 je5 dou1 hai6 mong1 cou2.
examples.translation: Silver grass is spreading all over the mountain and plains.

senses.definition: 質地係樹木嘅物件（量詞：嚿） (a piece of wood)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 沉船之後，佢攬住嚿木頭浮咗喺海上面三日先至俾人救起。
examples.jyutping: cam4 syun4 zi1 hau6, keoi5 laam2 zyu6 gau6 muk6 tau4 fau4 zo2 hai2 hoi2 soeng6 min6 saam1 jat6 sin1 zi3 bei2 jan4 gau3 hei2.
examples.translation: After the ship sank, he grasped onto a piece of wood and floated on the sea for three days before he was saved.

senses.definition: 形容遲鈍，懵懵地嘅人 ((figuratively) blockhead; fool; doofus)

examples.text: 佢乜嘢都唔識做，成嚿木頭噉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mat1 je5 dou1 m4 sik1 zou6, sing4 gau6 muk6 tau4 gam2.
examples.translation: He doesn't know how to do anything. He is such a blockhead.

senses.definition: 一種只有一面嘅曲面 (Möbius strip)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 八達通嘅標誌係一條莫比烏斯帶。
examples.jyutping: baat3 daat6 tung1 ge3 biu1 zi3 hai6 jat1 tiu4 mok6 bei2 wu1 si1 daai3
examples.translation: The symbol of Octopus Card is a Möbius strip.

senses.definition: #澳門 嘅別稱；英文名「Macau」嘅諧音 (Macau; used informally as a direct transliteration of "Macau"; officially Macau is known as #澳門)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 擁有崇高地位嘅#作家（量詞：個） (an influential author)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 查理士．狄更斯係公認嘅大文豪。
examples.jyutping: caa4 lei5 si6 dik6 gang1 si1 hai6 gung1 jing6 ge3 daai6 man4 hou4.
examples.translation: Charles Dickens is widely recognized as an influential author.

senses.definition: 對方表示完謝意之後嘅回應 (you are welcome; not at all; literally: do not be (so) polite)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: zan1 hai6 m4 goi1 saai3 nei5 aa3! m4 sai2 haak3 hei3!
examples.translation: Thank you very much!" "You're welcome.

senses.definition: 用嚟有禮貌噉拒絕對方邀請 ((as said by a guest) please do not bother)

examples.text: 「不如食埋晚飯先至走啦！」「唔使咁客氣喇，我今晚約咗人食飯喇。」
examples.jyutping: bat1 jyu4 sik6 maai4 maan5 faan6 sin1 zi3 zau2 laa1! m4 sai2 gam3 haak3 hei3 laa3, ngo5 gam1 maan1 joek3 zo2 jan4 sik6 faan6 laa3.
examples.translation: Why don't you have dinner here before you leave?" "Please do not bother. I am meeting someone to have dinner tonight.

senses.definition: 招呼來賓嘅時候，用嚟叫對方隨便，唔使太拘謹 ((as said by a host) make yourself at home; don't stand on ceremony; don't be so polite)

examples.text: 你坐低食件餅啦，唔使客氣喎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 co5 dai1 sik6 gin6 beng2 laa1, m4 sai2 haak3 hei3 wo3.
examples.translation: Please sit down and have a cake, don't stand on ceremony.

senses.definition: 好趕、好冇條理；形容個人好慌張、驚青 (rushed and muddled; (of person) flustered)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 個賊趁大家都好忙亂嘅時候走咗佬。
examples.jyutping: go3 caak2 can3 daai6 gaa1 dou1 hou2 mong4 lyun6 ge3 si4 hau6 zau2 zo2 lou2.
examples.translation: The thief escaped while everyone was flustered.

senses.definition: （同另一個人、另一樣嘢）有分別，唔一樣 (to be different from)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我唔同你，唔係想做乜就做乜。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 tung4 nei5, m4 hai6 soeng2 zou6 mat1 zau6 zou6 mat1.
examples.translation: I'm not the same as you. I can't do whatever I want.

senses.definition: 唔需要再擔心之後嘅事，再冇其他顧慮 (not having to be concerned about other worries, and thus able to focus on the main thing)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢有老婆打點屋企嘅事，無後顧之憂就可以更加專注發展事業。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jau5 lou5 po4 daa2 dim2 uk1 kei2 ge3 si6, mou4 hau6 gu3 zi1 jau1 zau6 ho2 ji5 gang3 gaa1 zyun1 zyu3 faat3 zin2 si6 jip6.
examples.translation: Since his wife dealt with familial matters back at home, he can focus on his career without worries.

senses.definition: 一種食肉嘅海魚，呈銀灰色，有暗色橫紋（量詞：條） (Scomberomorus, a type of mackerels)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 值得#學習、#模仿 嘅人（量詞：個） (role model; exemplar; paragon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多偉人都可以做我哋做人嘅模範。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 wai5 jan4 dou1 ho2 ji5 zou6 ngo5 dei6 zou6 jan4 ge3 mou4 faan6.
examples.translation: Many great people can be our role models on how to be a good person.

senses.definition: 本來係體育術語，指某個人嘅動作令比賽畫上句號，通常係指入波得分；而家呢個字已經可以引申到泛指完成一件事 (to finish a game; figuratively, to finish)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 美斯臨完場埋齋果腳超靚。
examples.jyutping: mei5 si1 lam4 jyun4 coeng4 maai4 zaai1 go2 goek3 ciu1 leng3.
examples.translation: Messi's game-ending goal was epic.

senses.definition: 喺瞬間擊敗敵人，實力差距好大 (to defeat your enemy or opponent in no time)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 對面嗰隊太廢，畀我哋秒殺晒。
examples.jyutping: deoi3 min6 go2 deoi6 taai3 fai3, bei2 ngo5 dei6 miu5 saat3 saai3.
examples.translation: The opposing team is just weak. We destroyed them in no time.

senses.definition: 迅速完成咗一件工作 (to finish something in no time)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 ji5 ging1 miu5 saat3 zo2 fan6 gung1 fo3.
examples.translation: I finished my homework in no time.

phonetic.original: m4 hou2 ji3 si1:m4 hou2 ji3 si3

senses.definition: 有禮貌咁表示自己嘅歉意；#sorry；#對唔住 (used to express regret, refusal or disagreement in a polite manner; sorry)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 唔好意思啊，咁夜打攪你。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 ji3 si3 aa3, gam3 je6 daa2 gaau2 nei5.
examples.translation: I'm sorry to disturb you so late at night.

senses.definition: 打斷人説話、打擾人嘅時候講嘅禮貌説話 (excuse me; usually used when interrupting people)

examples.text: 唔好意思，呢間餐廳唔可以食煙。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 ji3 si1, ni1 gaan1 caan1 teng1 m4 ho2 ji5 sik6 jin1.
examples.translation: Excuse me, but we do not allow smoking at this restaurant.

senses.definition: 受到其他人恩惠時未能夠回相應價值嘅禮而講嘅客氣説話 (to be embarrassed for receiving gifts or favors from others and not being able to return the favor)

examples.text: 我埋單嗰陣先發現身上得返廿蚊，最後阿明請咗我食飯，真係幾唔好意思呀。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 maai4 daan1 go2 zan6 sin1 faat3 jin6 san1 soeng6 dak1 faan1 jaa6 man1, zeoi3 hau6 aa3 ming4 ceng2 zo2 ngo5 sik6 faan6, zan1 hai6 gei2 m4 hou2 ji3 si1 aa3.
examples.translation: When the bill arrived I discovered I only had $20 in my pockets, so Ming treated me dinner that time. I feel so embarrassed.

senses.definition: 怕醜，被注目而唔自在 (to feel shy or embarrassed)

examples.text: 唔好望住啦，人哋女仔嚟㗎，幾唔好意思呢。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 mong1 zyu6 laa1, jan4 dei6 neoi5 zai2 lai4 gaa3, gei2 m4 hou2 ji3 si1 ne1.
examples.translation: Don't stare at her, she's a shy girl.

keywords: m4 hou2 ji3 si1:m4 hou2 ji3 si3

senses.definition: 組織內從屬於某人、聽從佢指令嘅人 (subordinate; follower)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tau4 maa5
examples.translation: right-hand man; adjutant

senses.definition: 一個人嘅行為或者一件事嘅處理方法得同慣常所見嘅唔一樣 (something or someone who doesn't look right or reasonable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你都唔係路嘅，點會將件乾淨衫放喺地下㗎！
examples.jyutping: nei5 dou1 m4 hai6 lou6 ge3, dim2 wui5 zoeng1 gin6 gon1 zeng6 saam1 fong3 hai2 dei6 haa5 gaa2!
examples.translation: Why did you put the washed clothes on the floor? How could you have done so!

senses.definition: 講究實際、致力於具體而實際嘅工作 (pragmatic; down-to-earth; dealing with concrete matters)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢份人好務實，唔會只講唔做。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 hou2 mou6 sat6, m4 wui5 zi2 gong2 m4 zou6.
examples.translation: He is a down-to-earth person. He will do what he says.

senses.definition: 避免唔到；無可避免、難免 (unavoidably; inevitably)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 啱啱學行嘅小朋友免不了會跌親。
examples.jyutping: ngaam1 ngaam1 hok6 hang4 ge3 siu2 pang4 jau5 min5 bat1 liu5 wui5 dit3 can1.
examples.translation: A toddler must fall on the ground unavoidably.

senses.definition: 唔尋常、刺激甚至可能有危險嘅活動或經驗（量詞：次／場） (adventure)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我永遠都會記得嗰次喺森林嘅冒險。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 wing5 jyun5 dou1 wui5 gei3 dak1 go2 ci3 hai2 sam1 lam4 ge3 mou6 him2.
examples.translation: I'll never forget that adventure in the forest.

senses.definition: 不然的話、#否則 (otherwise)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你要俾心機温書，唔係嘅話考試會唔合格㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 bei2 sam1 gei1 wan1 syu1, m4 hai6 ge3 waa2 haau2 si3 wui5 m4 hap6 gaak3 gaa3.
examples.translation: You should study hard, otherwise you'll fail the exam.

senses.definition: 無端端停咗而未完成 (to end while unfinished)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢有好多計劃，到最後都係無疾而終。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jau5 hou2 do1 gai3 waak6, dou3 zeoi3 hau6 dou1 hai6 mou4 zat6 ji4 zung1.
examples.translation: He has many plans but just leaves them unfinished.

senses.definition: 出名嘅作品；有名氣、多人識嘅作品，多數係文藝方面（量詞：個/件/幅/首） ((usu. of fine arts or literature) famous work; celebrated work)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 《命運交響曲》係貝多芬嘅名作。
examples.jyutping: ming6 wan6 gaau1 hoeng2 kuk1 hai6 bui3 do1 fan1 ge3 ming4 zok3.
examples.translation: Symphony No.5 is a famous piece of work by Ludwig van Beethoven.

senses.definition: 每日日落之後，日出之前嗰段時間 (night)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每一個夜晚，我將會遠望，無涯星海，點點星光。
examples.jyutping: mui5 jat1 go3 je5 maan6, ngo5 zoeng1 wui5 jyun5 mong6, mou4 ngaai4 sing1 hoi2, dim2 dim2 sing1 gwong1.
examples.translation: Every night I will look at the boundless sea of scattered stars shining afar.

senses.definition: 做出一啲無禮貌嘅行為，令人覺得唔受尊重 (to offend; to affront)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先小弟唔識嘢冒犯晒，各位請多多包涵！
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 siu2 dai6 m4 sik1 je5 mou6 faan6 saai3, gok3 wai2 cing2 do1 do1 baau1 haam4!
examples.translation: I didn't mean to offend you all just now. Please forgive my ignorance.

senses.definition: #夜晚 (night)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 熱線由朝早八點開放到晚頭夜九點。
examples.jyutping: jit6 sin3 jau4 ziu1 zou2 baat3 dim2 hoi1 fong3 dou3 maan5 tau4 je2 gau2 dim2.
examples.translation: The hotline is available from 8 in the morning to 9 at night.

senses.definition: 中國傳統書寫工具；#文房四寶 之一；筆桿通常用木、竹製成，筆頭用動物嘅毛製成；蘸墨之後可以用嚟寫書法同畫畫（量詞：支） (ink brush used in traditional Chinese calligraphy and painting)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿峯擅長用毛筆寫書法同畫中國畫。
examples.jyutping: aa3 fung1 sin6 coeng4 jung6 mou4 bat1 se2 syu1 faat3 tung4 waak6 zung1 gwok3 waa2.
examples.translation: A-fung writes calligraphy and draws Chinese paintings with an ink brush well.

senses.definition: 用喺句尾「#吖」「#啦」「#𠺢」「#喳」後面，用嚟表達強調或者確認 (used at the end of an utterance for emphasis or confirmation after #吖 (aa1), #啦 (laa1), #𠺢 (gaa1), #喳 (zaa1))
senses.label: 助詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 lei4 zau6 zou2 gong2 aa1 maa3!
examples.translation: Why didn't you tell us earlier that you are not coming?

senses.definition: #生物#死 咗之後離開身體嘅#靈魂 (Ghost of the dead)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 包括粵人在內，好多唐人#民系 傳統都相信#飛蛾 同亡魂有某啲瓜葛。
examples.jyutping: baau1 kwut3 jyut6 jan4 zoi6 noi6, hou2 do1 tong4 jan4 man4 hai6 cyun4 tung2 dou1 soeng1 seon3 fei1 ngo4 tung4 mong4 wan4 jau5 mau5 di1 gwaa1 got3.
examples.translation: Including the Cantonese, many subgroups of Han Chinese traditionally believe that moths are linked to ghosts of the dead.

senses.definition: 兩隻手都唔得閒，唔可以再做其他嘢 (not to have free hands; literally: no hand)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 好想買多啲，但係冇手拎。
examples.jyutping: hou2 soeng2 maai5 do1 di1, daan6 hai6 mou5 sau2 ling1.
examples.translation: I want to buy more, but my hands are not free.

senses.definition: 泛指所有物質上存在嘅物件（量詞：件） (material; things; stuff; items)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: go3 jan4 mat6 ban2
examples.translation: personal belongings

senses.definition: 條脷上面負責掌管味覺嘅感覺器官，用嚟辨別食物味道 (taste bud)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 由內數向外嘅第四隻手指（量詞：隻） (ring finger; literally, nameless finger)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 結婚戒指應該戴喺左手嘅無名指。
examples.jyutping: git3 fan1 gaai3 zi2 jing1 goi1 daai3 hai2 zo2 sau2 ge3 mou4 ming4 zi2.
examples.translation: A wedding ring should be put on the left ring finger.

senses.definition: #唔好；#咪；唔應該 (not; do not; should not)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: mok6 zoi3
examples.translation: not again

senses.definition: 唔能夠 (cannot)

examples.jyutping: baak3 ci4 mok6 bin6
examples.translation: cannot defy even with hundreds of words

senses.definition: 指農曆十二月十六，年內最後一次#做迓 拜土地公嘅儀式；根據傳統，呢日做生意嘅人會請伙記一齊食飯，而家尾禡通常係指呢餐飯。 (Mei-ngaa, the last worship to the earth god on 16/12 of the lunar calendar. Traditionally, businessmen would treat employees to a company dinner on that day, and nowadays this term often refers to the dinner.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今晚公司尾禡大抽獎，頭獎係十萬蚊現金獎喎！
examples.jyutping: gam1 maan5 gung1 si1 mei5 ngaa4 daai6 cau1 zoeng2, tau4 zoeng2 hai6 sap6 maan6 man1 jin6 gam1 zoeng2 wo3.
examples.translation: I heard that the first prize for the lucky draw at today's Mei-ngaa will be $100,000 in cash!

senses.definition: 冇同情心、惻隱之心，唔會受到影響；見到人哋受苦唔會覺得人哋慘或者想幫佢 (heartless; hardhearted)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你見死不救，實在太無情喇！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gin3 sei2 bat1 gau3, sat6 zoi6 taai3 mou4 cing4 laa3!
examples.translation: You didn't save me even when you saw that I was going to die, you're so heartless!

senses.definition: 有分別，唔一樣嘅 (different; distinct)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: m4 tung4 jan4 jau5 m4 tung4 si3 hou3.
examples.translation: Different people have different hobbies.

senses.definition: 印咗相或者圖案嘅硬咭紙，通常喺去旅行嘅時候喺當地寄俾朋友，作為留念，唔使連埋信封去寄；圖案一般係當地嘅風景或者特色物品，但亦都可以純粹美觀，同當地冇關係嘅圖樣（量詞：張） (postcard)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我去旅行一定會寫張明信片寄返屋企嘅。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 heoi3 leoi5 hang4 jat1 ding6 wui5 se2 zoeng1 ming4 seon3 pin2 gei3 faan1 uk1 kei2 ge3.
examples.translation: When I travel abroad, I'll definitely write a postcard and send it home.

senses.definition: （性格）需要長啲時間先同人熟到 (to warm up slowly to people)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 小慧份人好慢熱，唔會第一次見面就噉熱情。
examples.jyutping: siu2 wai6 fan6 jan4 hou2 maan6 jit6, m4 wui5 dai6 jat1 ci3 gin3 min6 zau6 gam2 jit6 cing4.
examples.translation: Siu-wai warms up slowly to people. She won't be very passionate when you first meet her.

senses.definition: 心情唔好、煩燥、容易發火 (irritable; easily lose temper)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 ni1 paai4 dim2 gaai2 gam3 ji6 mang2 gaa3?
examples.translation: Why do you lose your temper so easily these days?

senses.definition: 嬲、唔開心、心情唔好 (annoyed; displeased; angry)

examples.text: 今日真係好忟，原因係本來唔駛我做嘅野，因為嗰條廢柴無返，搞到我要幫佢做。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 zan1 hai6 hou2 mang2, jyun4 jan1 hai6 bun2 loi4 m4 sai2 ngo5 zou6 ge3 je5, jan1 wai6 go2 tiu4 fai3 caai4 mou5 faan1, gaau2 dou3 ngo5 jiu3 bong1 keoi5 zou6.
examples.translation: I'm really annoyed today. That worthless brat did not show up for work, and I had to take up his responsibilities for him, although originally I was not responsible for them.

senses.definition: 即係#面珠，有親暱嘅含意（量詞：個） (an intimate way to refer to "cheeks")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個啤啤嘅面珠墩好多肉，好得意。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 bi4 bi1 ge3 min6 zyu1 dan1 hou2 do1 juk6, hou2 dak1 ji3.
examples.translation: This baby has chubby cheeks, he's so cute.

senses.definition: 展示脆弱、可憐、悲情嘅姿態，博同情，藉此獲得支援 (to ask for pity/mercy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: maai6 siu2 koeng4 bat1 jyu4 kaau3 zi6 gei2.
examples.translation: Asking for pity is not as good as relying on yourself.

senses.definition: 好似發夢、幻想一樣冇乜可能實現嘅情境 (fantasy; illusion)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 迪士尼夢幻世界令你覺得離開咗現實生活。
examples.jyutping: dik6 si6 nei4 mung6 waan6 sai3 gaai3 ling6 nei5 gok3 dak1 lei4 hoi1 zo2 jin6 sat6 sang1 wut6.
examples.translation: The fantasy world of Disneyland makes you feel as if you have left the real world.

senses.definition: 喺夜晚舉行嘅酒會、派對，通常會有文娛節目（量詞：個） (soirée; evening party)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每年公司都會舉辦聖誕晚會。
examples.jyutping: mui5 nin4 gung1 si1 dou1 wui5 geoi2 baan6 sing3 daan3 maan5 wui2.
examples.translation: The company organises a Christmas evening party every year.

senses.definition: 喺夜晚舉行嘅集會 (an assembly held at night)

examples.jyutping: zuk1 gwong1 maan5 wui2
examples.translation: candlelight vigil

senses.definition: 以一樣嘢嘅價格作為參考，佢嘅價值比佢類似價格嘅同類嘢高好多；#性價比 高 (good value for money; bank for the buck; worth buying)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢件衫又平又靚，簡直係物超所值啦！
examples.jyutping: nei1 gin6 saam1 jau6 peng4 jau6 leng3, gaan2 zik6 hai6 mat6 ciu1 so2 zik6 laa1!
examples.translation: This shirt is nice and yet inexpensive, this is really good value for money!

senses.definition: 好安靜，唔引起人注意嘅情況下 (without any sound; silently)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 個賊仔無聲無息噉潛入咗我間屋。
examples.jyutping: go3 caak6 zai2 mou4 sing1 mou4 sik1 gam2 cim4 jap6 zo2 ngo5 gaan1 uk1.
examples.translation: The thief broke into my house silently.

senses.definition: 態度#冷淡，完全唔#關心 (to pay no attention at all)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢對老婆漠不關心咁，唔怪得最後離婚啦！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 deoi3 lou5 po4 mok6 bat1 gwaan1 sam1 gam2, m4 gwaai3 dak1 zeoi3 hau6 lei4 fan1 laa1!
examples.translation: His divorce is not surprising as he paid no attention at all to his wife.

senses.definition: #介意、在乎 (to mind to care, etymology: mind)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 maain1 gaa3.
examples.translation: I don't mind.

senses.definition: 性質相近嘅物件聚埋一齊。全句為：「物以類聚，人以群分。」 (birds of a feather flock together; means the same kind of things group together.)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 活動一完，佢地成班宅男就自然聚埋一齊交流心得，真係物以類聚。
examples.jyutping: wut6 dung6 jat1 jyun4, keoi5 dei6 seng4 baan1 zaak6 naam4 zau6 zi6 jin4 zeoi6 maai4 jat1 cai4 gaau1 lau4 sam1 dak1, zan1 hai6 mat6 ji5 leoi6 zeoi6.
examples.translation: Once the event is finished, those otakus group up naturally to exchange their minds, birds of a feather really flock together.

senses.definition: 計算賬目總額 (to make the final calculation; to cash up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老闆娘每晚都會埋完數先走。
examples.jyutping: lou5 baan2 noeng4 mui5 maan5 dou1 wui5 maai4 jyun4 sou3 sin1 zau2.
examples.translation: The owner will leave her shop after totting up the sales.

senses.definition: 形容埋身肉搏、激烈打鬥。亦引申指兩人之間激烈性交。 (to start of fight, to get into real deal; originate from cricket (gryllidae) fighting, when two crickets fight closely and violently, they will open their mouth and  bite each other with teeth. The term then extended to mean having sex with someone vigorously.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢兩個嘈咗幾日，今朝終於埋牙打鑊甘。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 loeng5 go3 cou4 zo2 gei2 jat6, gam1 ziu1 zung1 jyu1 maai4 ngaa4 daa2 wok6 gam1.
examples.translation: They have argued for several days already, this morning they finally fought violently.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
形容啲嘢逼埋喺一個好細嘅空間 (densely filled; too dense)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 個櫃桶塞到密質質，冇位淨喇。
examples.jyutping: go3 gwai6 tung2 sak1 dou3 mat6 zat1 zat1, mou5 wai2 zing6 laa3.
examples.translation: The drawer is filled fully and there's no space left.

senses.definition: 著喺腳度，用嚟保護對腳同吸汗嘅布製品（量詞：隻／對） (socks)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: si1 mat6
examples.translation: stockings

senses.definition: 形容新聞、資訊傳到好多人都知道，而且傳播速度仲要好快，令好多人關注呢件事 (news or rumour spread all over a place; to spread like wildfire)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 傳媒將官員失職嘅事誇大，搞到滿城風雨，最後令到嗰個官員辭職。
examples.jyutping: cyun4 mui4 zoeng3 gun1 jyun4 sat1 zik1 ge3 si6 kwaa1 daai6, gaau2 dou3 mun5 sing4 fung1 jyu5, zeoi3 hau6 ling6 dou3 go2 go3 gun1 jyun4 ci4 zik1.
examples.translation: The mass media exaggerated the malpractice of an official and the news spread like wildlife. Finally, he had to resign.

senses.definition: #小巫見大巫 、無得比；比喻兩者強弱差別懸殊 (one cannot be compared with others; one of two things being compared is far superior or stronger to the second; literally: a mosquito thigh compared with an ox thigh)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你嘅家境同佢比，簡直係蚊髀同牛髀呀。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ge3 gaa1 ging2 tung4 keoi5 bei2, gaan2 zik6 hai6 man1 bei2 tung4 ngau4 bei2 aa3.
examples.translation: Obviously, your family's financial situation cannot be compared with his.

senses.definition: 忽然；不經意 (suddenly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 幾日冇見，佢驀然回想，先發現女朋友已經唔愛佢喇！
examples.jyutping: gei2 jat6 mou5 gin3, keoi5 mak6 jin4 wui4 soeng2, sin1 faat3 jin6 neoi5 pang4 jau5 ji5 ging1 m4 oi3 keoi5 laa3!
examples.translation: Having not seen his girlfriend for a few days, he is suddenly aware that she is not in love with him anymore.

senses.definition: 字面解無可非議。用嚟感激其他人嘅幫忙。 ((used to show that one appreciates the favour that somebody has done) marvellous; very good indeed; literally: it goes without saying)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢咁忙都嚟幫我整電腦，真係唔話得喇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam3 mong4 dou1 lai4 bong1 ngo5 zing2 din6 nou5, zan1 hai6 m4 waa6 dak1 laa3.
examples.translation: He was so busy but he still came and fixed my computer for me. He's really marvellous!

senses.definition: 問人發生緊咩事或者某件事發展成點；問人乜嘢情況 (a general question or greeting - "what's going on?", "what's happening?")
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: me1 waan4 ging2? sai2 m4 sai2 bong1 sau2?
examples.translation: What's happening? Need help?

senses.definition: 令人背上一啲佢查實冇犯嘅罪名；#老屈 (to slander, to falsely accuse (someone))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你頭先講我嘅衰嘢冇一件係真嘅，你唔好喺度誣衊我喎！
examples.jyutping: nei5 tau4 sin1 gong2 ngo5 ge3 seoi1 je5 mou5 jat1 gin6 hai6 zan1 ge3, nei5 m4 hou2 hai2 dou6 mou4 mit6 ngo5 wo3!
examples.translation: None of the accusation you made against me is true. Don't you dare to slander me!

senses.definition: 唔上心、唔在意 (indifferent; not caring)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 連我有食物敏感都唔知，你都冇心裝載嘅。
examples.jyutping: lin4 ngo5 jau5 sik6 mat6 man5 gam2 dou1 m4 zi1, nei5 dou1 mou5 sam1 zong1 zoi3 ge2.
examples.translation: You are not caring enough as you don't even know that I have a food allergy.

senses.definition: 無視；唔重視；唔理會 (to ignore; to neglect; to treat with indifference)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 返工唔俾去廁所簡直係漠視緊員工嘅權益！
examples.jyutping: faan1 gung1 m4 bei2 heoi3 ci3 so2 gaan2 zik6 hai6 mok6 si6 gan2 jyun4 gung1 ge3 kyun4 jik1!
examples.translation: Prohibiting workers from going to toilet while they are on duty is neglecting their rights and interests!

senses.definition: 生產所牽涉到嘅#物質（量詞：種／隻） (material)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tin1 jin4 mat6 liu2
examples.translation: natural material

senses.definition: #盲目 噉去#追求 某啲嘢。 (to blindly seek something.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先#百貨公司 一開閘啫，就有成班#師奶 衝入去盲搶啲#特價 貨。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 baak3 fo3 gung1 si1 jat1 hoi1 zaap6 ze1, zau6 jau5 seng4 baan1 si1 laai1 cung1 jap6 heoi3 maang4 coeng2 di1 dak6 gaa3 fo3.
examples.translation: Just now, at the moment the department store opened, a gang of housewives flooded in there to grab discounted goods.

senses.definition: 透過#互聯網 買嘢，而貨物亦以郵寄或者快遞形式送到 (to shop online)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 而家好多年青人鍾意網購。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 hou2 do1 nin4 cing1 jan4 zung1 ji3 mong5 kau3.
examples.translation: Nowadays many young people like online shopping.

senses.definition: #多謝；向對方表示感激，語氣強啲 (thank you so much, in a sincere tone)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 唔該晒你幫我拎啲野返去啊。
examples.jyutping: m4 goi1 saai3 nei5 bong1 ngo5 ling1 di1 je5 faan1 heoi3 aa3.
examples.translation: Thank you so much for helping me carry these things back.

senses.definition: 詢問點樣去某個地方 (to ask the way; to ask for directions)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你唔識去好心就問路啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 sik1 heoi3 hou2 sam1 zau6 man6 lou6 laa1.
examples.translation: If you don't know how to go there, you should ask for directions.

senses.definition: 句尾配「#囉」lo1，喺質問／反問嘅時候用嚟帶出顯而易見嘅事實 (used in conjunction with an utterance-final #囉 lo1 to spell out something that is obvious in a questioning manner; often translated into tag questions or rhetorical questions in English)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 mai6 syu1 zo2 lo1!
examples.translation: He's lost, hasn't he!

senses.definition: 句尾配「#囉」lo1或者上升語調，用喺連接原因同結果或者建議 (then; used in conjunction with an utterance-final #囉 lo1 or rising intonation to connect a conditional and a result or suggestion)

examples.jyutping: nei5 zung1 ji3 mai6 lo2 heoi3 lo1.
examples.translation: If you like it, then you can have it.

senses.definition: 前後接住同一個動詞短語，表示即使呢件事發生，都冇所謂 (if it is followed and preceded by the same verb phrase, it means the speaker does not care about the consequence of the event)

examples.jyutping: fat6 cin2 mai6 fat6 cin2!
examples.translation: Penalty? I don't care!

senses.definition: 形容一個人經歷咗啲危險嘅事或者大病，最後無事 (being safe or without injury after having been in dangerous situation, like a place or sickness)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 擔心死阿媽喇，好彩你去完北韓返嚟都冇穿冇爛。
examples.jyutping: daam1 sam1 sei2 aa3 maa1 laa3, hou2 coi2 nei5 heoi3 jyun4 bak1 hon4 faan1 lai4 dou1 mou5 cyun1 mou5 laan6.
examples.translation: Mum worried about your safety so much, fortunately you came back from North Korea safely.

senses.definition: 為國捐軀，戰死沙場 (to die with one's boots on)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 男人就要奮勇抗敵，要死都寧願死喺戰場上面，馬革裹屍，唔好病死喺牀上。
examples.jyutping: naam4 jan2 zau6 jiu3 fan5 jung5 kong3 dik6, jiu3 sei2 dou1 ning4 jyun2 sei2 hai2 zin3 coeng4 soeng6 min6, maa5 gaak3 gwo2 si1, m4 hou2 beng6 sei2 hai2 cong4 soeng6.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]A real man should bravely fight against the enemy. He would rather die on the battlefield than die of illness in bed, with his body wrapped in horsehide.

senses.definition: 將片段播映嘅速度降低，令到畫面入面嘅嘢慢過日常生活所見到嘅 (slow motion)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 跑馬唔肯定邊隻馬衝線先嘅，就要慢鏡睇多次。
examples.jyutping: paau2 maa5 m4 hang2 ding6 bin1 zek3 maa5 cung1 sin3 sin1 ge3, zau6 jiu3 maan6 geng3 tai2 do1 ci3.
examples.translation: If it is difficult to determine which horse crossed the finish line during the horse racing, we will check the slow motion video.

senses.definition: 見過嘅人嘅#面孔 (face)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: saang1 min6 hau2
examples.translation: (of people) new; strange; unfamiliar

senses.definition: 表情；面色 (facial expression)

examples.text: 佢好唔中意我，見親我佢都唔好面口。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 m4 zung1 ji3 ngo5, gin3 can1 ngo5 keoi5 dou1 m4 hou2 min6 hau2.
examples.translation: She really doesn't like me and grimaces at me every time we meet.

senses.definition: 物體表層一片片咁分離、掉落 (to flake; to exfoliate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢棟大廈啲外牆剝落得好犀利喎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 dung6 daai6 haa6 di1 ngoi6 coeng4 mok1 lok6 dak1 hou2 sai1 lei6 wo3.
examples.translation: The outer walls of this building are flaking seriously.

senses.definition: 一種賭博。用#骰 賭大細(又可以叫買骰寶)，用三粒骰仔響密封的#骰盅 入面搖動，使之得出任意嘅總數。總數4-10點為開細，11-17點為#開大，三粒骰點數一樣叫#圍骰，#大小通殺。 (sic bo; tai-sai; big and small; hi-lo; a gambling game;  players bet on "big", "small" or "triples", then 3 dice are rolled to get a total score, 4-10 is "small", 11-17 is "big", and 3 dice showing the same number is called "triples")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢單生意好似買大細咁，好大風險好難估喎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 daan1 saang1 ji3 hou2 ci5 maai5 daai6 sai3 gam2, hou2 daai6 fung1 him2 hou2 naan4 gu2 wo3.
examples.translation: This deal is just like betting on Tai-Sai, so risky and unpredictable.

senses.definition: 唔係自己本身，只係借嚟做一啲嘢嘅另一個#名 或者身分，例如係代自己過咗身嘅先人捐錢嘅時候 (behalf; name)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我用爺爺嘅名義捐咗一百萬俾呢間大學。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jung6 je4 je2 ge3 ming4 ji6 gyun1 zo2 jat1 baak3 maan6 bei2 ni1 gaan1 daai6 hok6.
examples.translation: I have donated 1 million dollars to this university on behalf of my grandfather.

senses.definition: 形容植物生長良好，枝葉好多、好密 ((of plants) luxuriant; flourishing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢棵蘋果樹好茂盛，結咗好多果。
examples.jyutping: ni1 po1 ping4 gwo2 syu6 hou2 mau6 sing6, git3 zo2 hou2 do1 gwo2.
examples.translation: This apple tree is flourishing, and there are so many apples.

senses.definition: 收埋響地底之下 (to bury; to hide underground)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 秘密咁收埋一樣嘢 (to secretly conceal something)

examples.text: 呢個秘密喺佢個心入面埋藏咗好多年。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 bei3 mat6 hai2 keoi5 go3 sam1 jap6 min6 maai4 cong4 zo2 hou2 do1 nin4.

senses.definition: 某啲基因因為佢哋有利於生存同繁殖而喺一個物種嘅基因庫嗰度變得更加常見嘅過程。 (Natural selection)

examples.text: 物競天擇呢個概念係由達爾文提出嘅。
examples.jyutping: mat6 ging3 tin1 zaak6 ni1 go3 koi3 nim6 hai6 jau4 daat6 ji5 man4 tai4 ceot1 ge3.

senses.definition: 每一次 (whenever; every time when)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: mui5 fung4
examples.translation: whenever

senses.definition: #唔啦更；#九唔搭八；無聊；冇內容 (irrelevant; senseless; silly; stupid; pointless)

examples.text: 佢成日講埋啲無厘頭嘅嘢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 gong2 maai4 di1 mou4 lei4 tau4 ge3 je5.

senses.definition: 一種香港文化：利用冇邏輯嘅笑話或者誇張嘅動作，突出人物衝突或社會矛盾，造成幽默同諷刺嘅效果（代表人物：周星馳） ("nonsense speak", a non-sequitur style of punning conversation fashionable in Hong Kong in the late 1980s and early 1990s, popularised and developed by radio disc jockeys and in the films of Stephen Chau.)
長度單位；約等於3.26#光年，通常用嚟量度宇宙天體嘅距離 (parsec)

examples.jyutping: sap6 ji6 maa5

senses.definition: 網絡軍隊，從事具軍事目的嘅網絡活動組織 (cyber army)

examples.translation: The kitten takes a chair for Great-aunt to sit. (Note: a line in the lyrics of a traditional nursery rhyme)

examples.text: 嗰個女人喺法庭裏面攞手機影啲陪審員，畀法官告佢藐視法庭。

examples.translation: That woman used her mobile phone to take pictures of the jurors inside the court. She was charged with contempt of court by the judge.

senses.definition: 一種妓院，由職員帶領#妓女 畀#嫖客 揀，呢個名由八十年代開始流行，妓女又名「#胭脂馬」 (brothel, a place where employees bring prostitutes to a client; the term has been used since the 80's as prostitutes were called "rouge horses")

senses.definition: 春秋末年#墨子 所創立嘅流派；學説以兼愛及非攻（反對出於私慾嘅侵略）為中心，高舉上天意志及鬼神賞善罰惡之説，並崇尚賢士；提倡節儉，去除繁瑣禮俗，反對奢侈浪費；成員結社，有嚴格嘅組織同紀律 (Mohism)

senses.definition: 事實擺在眼前，得到充份證據支持，冇得否認 (undeniable)

examples.text: 無可否認，我係遲到，但係我有理由㗎！你唔好嬲我啦！
examples.jyutping: mou4 ho2 fau2 jing6, ngo5 hai6 ci4 dou3, daan6 hai6 ngo5 jau5 lei5 jau4 gaa3! nei5 m4 hou2 nau1 ngo5 laa1!
examples.translation: It's undeniable that I'm late, but I have my reasons! You don't need to get angry with me!

senses.definition: 形容美好嘅事物非常多，無法一一收納 (more beauty than the eyes can take in)

examples.jyutping: saan1 soeng6 min6 fung1 ging2 ji4 jan4, mei5 bat1 sing1 sau1.

examples.jyutping: keoi5 maai4 sau2 jyu1 se2 zok3.

senses.definition: 集中精神，專心致力咁去做一件事 (to immerse oneself in; to be engrossed in)

examples.jyutping: maai4 tau4 fu2 gon3

senses.definition: #命（meng6）嘅讀書音，通常用喺配詞 (life; fate; the literary pronunciation for 命 meng6, usually used in compounds)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: sing3 ming6
examples.translation: life; lives

senses.definition: #命令；上級叫下屬做嘢 (to order; to command; order; instruction)

examples.jyutping: ming6 ling6
examples.translation: order; instruction; to order

senses.definition: 指派名號、職位 (to assign a title; to entitle)

examples.jyutping: ming6 ming4
examples.translation: to name

senses.definition: #勉強 冇好結果，唔會令人滿意 (if you don't want to do something, forcing yourself to do it won't bring you happiness)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 唔想做就唔好做啦，勉強冇幸福呀！

examples.jyutping: nei5 jau5 nei5 ge3 sang1 wut6, ngo5 jau5 ngo5 ge3 mong4 luk1.

senses.definition: 一啲都唔受#感動 (to be aloof and indifferent)

examples.translation: I am 80 years old, and I still have not yet met such a good person.

senses.definition: 新作品、產品推出 (to debut; to come out; to be released)

examples.translation: The new phone will release tomorrow.

examples.text: 你買餸嗰陣，記得順手幫我去郵局交埋水電單。

senses.definition: 將一個進行中嘅動作延續，直至完成為止 (to express continuation until the completion of an ongoing action)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 zou6 maai4 di1 gam2 ge3 je5, ci4 zou2 jau5 bou3 jing3 gaa3!
examples.translation: He'll definitely reap his own punishment for doing all those (bad) things!

senses.definition: 用嚟#打麻雀 嘅木板；四方形，四條邊有框，用嚟做枱面，中間平面用嚟放麻雀（量詞：張） (mahjong table; a wooden square board used for playing mahjong)

senses.definition: 屋企或者公司嘅大門 (door)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 sam1 mun4 wu6
examples.translation: be careful of the doors

senses.definition: 通去另一個地方嘅出入口 (gateway)

examples.text: 呢個機場係城市嘅門户。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 gei1 coeng4 hai6 sing4 si5 ge3 mun4 wu6.
examples.translation: This airport is the gateway to the city.

senses.definition: 引申指獨立嘅#家庭 或者#生意 (figuratively, one's family or business)

examples.text: 佢哋兩兄弟都大嘍，要自立門户喇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 hing1 dai6 dou1 daai6 lo3, jiu3 zi6 laap6 mun4 wu6 laa3.
examples.translation: The two brothers have now grown up, it's time for them to set up their own families.

senses.definition: 一個人值得欣賞、尊重或者仿傚嘅品格同行為（量詞：種／項） (virtue; moral excellence; righteousness)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zit3 gim6 hai6 jat1 zung2 mei5 dak1.
examples.translation: Thrift is a virtue.

senses.definition: 清楚、仔細噉睇到啲嘢 (to observe something clearly and in detail)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 正式咁幫其他人或物起個#名 (to name; to denominate; to christen)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 香港有啲街名係用前港督嘅名命名嘅。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 jau5 di1 gaai1 meng2 hai6 jung6 cin4 gong2 duk1 ge3 meng2 ming6 ming4 ge3.
examples.translation: Some streets in Hong Kong are named after its former governors.

senses.definition: 一啲透過互聯網認識嘅朋友一齊見面聚會 (gathering of internet friends)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 心中充滿 (full of; literally: to have one's cavities filled with)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mun5 hong1 han6 ji3
examples.translation: with full hatred

senses.definition: 用茅草搭成嘅屋仔（量詞：間） (a shed or a hut made of straw)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 植物開始生出莖部，可以比喻事情喺起步階段 (to bud; to sprout)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: mang4 sang1
examples.translation: to grow

senses.definition: 發出，散播出；通常係氣體 (to emit; to give off; to come out)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 gaa3 ce1 tau4 mou6 jin1.
examples.translation: There is smoke coming from the front of my car.

senses.definition: 令自己有機會陷於危險之中 (to risk; to brave)

examples.jyutping: mou6 sang1 ming6 ngai4 him2
examples.translation: to risk one's life

senses.definition: 假扮 (to pretend to be someone or something)

examples.jyutping: gaa2 mou6
examples.translation: to pretend to be

senses.definition: 自己嘅論點互相否定、唔連貫，#一時一樣 (contradictory; inconsistent)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 篇文前後矛盾，都唔知邊句先真。
examples.jyutping: pin1 man2 cin4 hau6 maau4 teon5, dou1 m4 zi1 bin1 geoi3 sin1 zan1.
examples.translation: The article is inconsistent; I don't know which part can be trusted.

senses.definition: 有太多顧累，又兼顧唔到唔同嘅嘢，做唔到決定，#十五十六 咁 (ambivalent)

examples.text: 我嘅心情真係好矛盾啊，究竟同唔同佢分手好呢？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ge3 sam1 cing4 zan1 hai6 hou2 maau4 teon5 aa3, gau3 ging2 tung4 m4 tung4 keoi5 fan1 sau2 hou2 ne1?
examples.translation: I feel ambivalent; should I break up with him or not?

senses.definition: 人與人之間因為價值觀或者利害嘅差異，產生嘅反感或者敵意 (contradiction; discrepancy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋之間嘅矛盾好難消除。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 zi1 gaan1 ge3 maau4 teon5 hou2 naan4 siu1 ceoi4
examples.translation: The differences between us make us hard to reconcile.

senses.definition: 問下內心最真、最純粹嘅諗法 (to ask one's conscience)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 問心嗰句，你有冇鍾意過佢呀？
examples.jyutping: man6 sam1 go2 geoi3, nei5 jau5 mou5 zung1 ji3 gwo3 keoi5 aa3?
examples.translation: You have to ask yourself: Have you ever had feelings towards her?

senses.definition: 唔足夠；唔夠滿足 (not enough; not satisfied)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 今晚先打得嗰三圈，唔夠皮呀！
examples.jyutping: gam1 maan1 sin1 daa2 dak1 go2 saam1 hyun1, m4 gau3 pei2 aa3!
examples.translation: We've only played three rounds of Mahjong tonight! That's not enough!

senses.definition: 便條紙（量詞：張） (memo)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你有冇見過一張上面寫咗個電話號碼嘅memo紙呀？
examples.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mou5 gin3 gwo3 jat1 zoeng1 soeng6 min6 se2 zo2 go3 din6 waa2 hou6 maa5 ge3 mi1 mou2 zi2 aa3?
examples.translation: Have you seen a memo with a phone number written on it?

senses.definition: 即 #埋單，本來只係用喺中國大陸，係廣東話 #埋單 嘅 #普通話 音譯，但而家有部份人會直接當成廣東話使用。 (An incorrect usage of #埋單 (means "The bill please.") due to speaking in Cantonese following the words used in Mainland directly. The phrase is the result of #埋單 being transliterated from Cantonese to Putonghua.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: maai5 daan1 aa3!
examples.translation: The bill please!

senses.definition: #陰司紙 (synthetic paper money burnt for the dead)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟區別唔同人、動物、物件嘅叫法（量詞：個） (name; title)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 不如你讀個書名出嚟吖？
examples.jyutping: bat1 jyu4 nei5 duk6 go3 syu1 meng4 ceot1 lei4 aa1?
examples.translation: How about you read out the book title?

senses.definition: 因為嚇親或驚而神情痴呆、#擘大口得個窿 (to be dumfounded; to be amazed; to stupefy)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 馬戲團嘅表演令台下嘅觀眾睇到目瞪口呆。
examples.jyutping: maa5 hei3 tyun4 ge3 biu2 jin2 ling6 toi4 haa6 ge3 gun1 zung3 tai2 dou3 muk6 dang1 hau2 ngoi4.
examples.translation: The circus show completely amazed the audience.

senses.definition: 唔超過、冇其他嘢超過 ((of degree) the most)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 最開心嘅事莫過於同朋友傾偈。
examples.jyutping: zeoi3 hoi1 sam1 ge3 si6 mok6 gwo3 jyu1 tung4 pang4 jau5 king1 gai2.
examples.translation: Nothing brings me more joy than chatting with friends.

senses.definition: 好似素描噉形容、記述某個人、物或者事嘅細節 (description)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 miu4 seot6 hou2 cing1 co2.
examples.translation: His description is very clear.

senses.definition: 防止蚊進入嘅網（量詞：個） (mosquito net)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺郊外住要掛蚊帳瞓覺。
examples.jyutping: hai2 gaau1 ngoi6 zyu6 jiu3 gwaa3 man1 zoeng3 fan3 gaau3
examples.translation: When you live in countryside, you need to hang a mosquito net when sleeping.

senses.definition: 對某人感到唔高興、唔同意、反感，令到個樣顯出反白眼等不耐煩表情；#唔順超 (to be unwelcome or unagreeable to someone; to dislike someone on sight, such that one may roll their eyes, or glare at them.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jyut6 tai2 keoi5 zau6 jyut6 m4 seon6 ngaan5.
examples.translation: The more I look at him, the more he pisses me off.

senses.definition: #順眼 嘅相反，形容服飾、場景或人個樣唔好睇，唔靚，唔襯 ((of clothing or decorations) unpleasing to the eye; unpleasant to look at; unharmoniously arranged; having an unattractive appearance)

examples.text: 呢隻牆紙同套梳化撞晒色，一啲都唔順眼。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zek3 coeng4 zi2 tung4 tou3 so1 faa2 zong6 saai3 sik1, jat1 di1 dou1 m4 seon6 ngaan5
examples.translation: The colour of this wallpaper completely clashes with that of the sofa. It looks awful.

senses.definition: 味道好正 (delicious; tasty)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: mei5 mei6 gaai1 ngaau4
examples.translation: tasty delicacy

senses.definition: 從各方面去了解一樣嘢 (to view from every aspect)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 man4 faa3 min6 min6 gun1
examples.translation: aspects of Hong Kong culture

senses.definition: 泛指 #蚊 之類嘅昆蟲嘅合稱 (a general term for mosquito-like insects)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 記得要清理積水，避免蚊蟲滋生啊。
examples.jyutping: gei3 dak1 jiu3 cing1 lei5 zik1 seoi2, bei6 min5 man1 cung4 zi1 sang1 aa3.
examples.translation: Remember to dispose of stagnant water so as to avoid the breeding of mosquitoes.

senses.definition: 形容前途、前景、將來嘅發展越來越好 ((regarding prospects and future development) to have great potential; to go beyond limits)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 新婚夫婦一齊度過嘅悠閒假期 (honeymoon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: dou6 mat6 jyut6
examples.translation: to go on a honeymoon

phonetic.original: m4 faat3 fo2 dong3 beng6 maau1
jyutping: m4 faat3 fo2 dong3 beng6 maau1

senses.definition: 形容一個人唔發嬲，就冇人當佢係一回事 (used to complain that someone is not taking the speaker seriously, that only if the speaker loses his temper or becomes violent will the addressee take him or her seriously; literally: if one doesn't explode one is treated like a sick cat)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: m4 faat3 fo2 dong3 beng6 maau1
m faat fo dong beng maau

senses.definition: 非廿四小時運行嘅交通工具嘅班次中，最尾開出嗰班 ((of transportation) last departure)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mei5 baan1 ce1
examples.translation: last bus/train/tram

senses.definition: 即係#即刻；呢個時刻 (immediately; at once)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 已經八點半喇，我要即刻出門口先唔會遲到！
examples.jyutping: ji5 ging1 baat3 dim2 bun3 laa3, ngo5 jiu3 zik1 hak1 ceot1 mun4 hau2 sin1 m4 wui5 ci4 dou3!
examples.translation: It's already been 8:30. I have to leave home immediately, so I won't be late!

senses.definition: 走佬；逃命 (to flee; to go into exile)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 唔怕死嘅 (fearless; desperate)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: mong4 ming6 zi1 tou4
examples.translation: desperado

senses.definition: （指交通工具）好快嘅；極速嘅 ((of transportations) speedy; at a crazy speed)

examples.jyutping: mong4 ming6 siu2 baa1
examples.translation: minibus that drives at a crazy speed

senses.definition: 唔怕#死 嘅人 (desperado; desperate or reckless person, especially a criminal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢地全部都係亡命之徒， 為咗錢做乜都得，連命都可以唔要。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 cyun4 bou6 dou1 hai6 mong4 ming6 zi1 tou4 wai6 zo2 cin2 zou6 mat1 dou1 dak1 lin4 meng6 dou1 ho2 ji5 m4 jiu3.
examples.translation: They are a gang of desperadoes who do anything for money including giving up on their lives.

senses.definition: 每一次某一樣嘢發生嘅時候 (whenever)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 每當翻風落雨，我個膝頭就痛。
examples.jyutping: mui5 dong1 faan1 fung1 lok6 jyu5, ngo5 go3 sat1 tau4 zau6 tung3.
examples.translation: Whenever it turns windy or rainy, my knees become painful.

senses.definition: 通常形容一個人冇運氣，樣樣嘢都好黑仔；或者跌到落谷底 (to be extremely unlucky, to have hit rock bottom, to be at one's lowest point)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zan1 hai6 mui4 dam3 doe3 laa3
examples.translation: What horrible luck!

senses.definition: 男女方完全唔了解對方就要結婚 (arranged marriage)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家印度、中國都仲有盲婚啞嫁。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 jan3 dou6, zung1 gwok3 dou1 zung6 jau5 maang4 fan1 aa2 gaa3.
examples.translation: Arranged marriage could still be found in India and China.

senses.definition: 令一樣嘢唔再存在；終結某種狀態 (to extinguish; to wipe out)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: siu1 mit6
examples.translation: to exterminate

senses.definition: 使用錯誤嘅#推論 方法嚟建構#論證，又分為形式謬誤同非形式謬誤（量詞：個） (fallacy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 話因為「若甲則乙」邏輯上無效，所以乙一定錯，係一種謬誤，叫謬誤論證。
examples.jyutping: waa6 jan1 wai6 joek6 gaap3 zak1 jyut6 lo4 cap1 soeng6 mou4 haau6, so2 ji5 jyut6 jat1 ding6 co3, hai6 jat1 zung2 mau6 ng6, giu3 mau6 ng6 leon6 zing3.
examples.translation: Claiming that Q is definitely wrong because "if P then Q" is logically invalid, is a kind of fallacy called "argument from fallacy".

senses.definition: 期待答案或者資訊嘅句子（量詞：個／條） (question; enquiry)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 隨便問問題，我會盡量答。
examples.jyutping: ceoi2 bin2 man6 man6 tai4, ngo5 wui5 zeon6 loeng6 daap3.
examples.translation: Ask anything you want, I'll answer as best I can.

senses.definition: 疑難；麻煩（量詞：個） (problem; trouble)

examples.jyutping: gaai2 kyut3 man6 tai4
examples.translation: to resolve an issue; to troubleshoot

senses.definition: 辦事唔可靠、冇交代；為人不負責任；待人接物有失分寸 (unreliable, unaccountable, irresponsible, lacking of propriety)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢做嘢好冇搭霎，你最好跟緊啲。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zou6 je5 hou2 mou5 daap3 saap3, nei5 zeoi3 hou2 gan1 gan2 di1.
examples.translation: He is quite irresponsible. You'd better keep following up with him.

senses.definition: 唔容易令人察覺到 (to not be easy to find/see/spot something)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我周圍望都唔覺眼揾到佢喎。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zau1 wai4 mong6 dou1 m4 gok3 ngaan5 wan2 dou2 keoi5 wo3.
examples.translation: I looked around everywhere but I still couldn't find him.

senses.definition: 小型物件嘅計算單位 (quantifier for small-piece things like stamps, coins, etc.)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 zoeng1 jau4 piu3
examples.translation: a stamp

senses.definition: 假冒一個人嘅姓名，冒充佢嘅身份 (to fake someone's identity; to go under someone's name; to use someone's name)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢冒名代佢細佬去比賽俾人發現，所以被取消資格。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mou6 ming4 doi6 keoi5 sai3 lou2 heoi3 bei2 coi3 bei2 jan4 faat3 jin6, so2 ji5 bei6 ceoi2 siu1 zi1 gaak3.
examples.translation: He was discovered to be using his younger brother's name to enter the competition and was thus disqualified.

senses.definition: 形容食物太少，唔夠食、唔夠喉 (not enough food for consumption)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 得嗰兩塊餅都唔夠攝牙罅。
examples.jyutping: dak1 go2 loeng5 faai3 beng2 dou1 m4 gau3 sip3 ngaa4 laa3.
examples.translation: These two pieces of biscuit are far from enough.

senses.definition: 用嚟安慰人或者自己嘅講法，指情況未算最差，未去到要死嘅地埗 (an utterance used to encourage someone, implying that the situation is still not bad enough to give up, "it won't cost you your life!".)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 冇咗幾萬蚊之嘛，唔使死喎。
examples.jyutping: mou5 zo2 gei2 maan6 man1 zaa1 maa3, m4 sai2 sei2 wo3.
examples.translation: It's only several ten thousand dollars. That won't cost you your life.

senses.definition: 同嗰件事無關係 ("No, it's not that"; to have nothing to do with)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 「係咪電視太嘈呀？」「唔關事，我今朝已經唔係好舒服。」
examples.jyutping: hai6 mai6 din6 si6 taai3 cou4 aa3? m4 gwaan1 si6, ngo5 gam1 ziu1 ji5 ging1 m4 hai6 hou2 syu1 fuk6
examples.translation: What's the matter? Is the TV too loud?" "No, it's not that. I've been feeling unwell since this morning.

senses.definition: #武裝#力量，通常係軍隊 (military force)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jung6 mou5 lik6 gaai2 kyut3 man6 tai4
examples.translation: to solve a problem by military force

senses.definition: 身體#物理 上嘅#力量 (physical force)

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Mo" or "Mou")

examples.jyutping: mau6 ng6
examples.translation: fallacy

senses.definition: 綁緊；結合 (to tighten; to bind)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: mei6 jyu5 cau4 mau4
examples.translation: to get well prepared; literally: to tighten (the windows) before the rain

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Miu", "Mio" or "Mau")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 民族名；發源於東南亞，並分佈喺中國南部及東南亞多國，操苗語 (Hmongb, the Miao, tribes living in southern China and south-east Asia)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: miu4 jan4
examples.translation: Hmongb people; Miao people

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Miu")
姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Mak")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 薄嘅、容易捲曲嘅皮，有陣時會由其他物質仿製而成（量詞：塊／層） (membrane; thin coating)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: si6 mong5 mok2
examples.translation: retina

senses.definition: 親眼睇見事發經過嘅#證人（量詞：個） (eyewitness)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #目擊 到事發經過嘅人（量詞：個） (eyewitness)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有個目擊者話聽到好大聲呯一聲。
examples.jyutping: jau5 go3 muk6 gik1 ze2 waa6 teng1 dou2 hou2 daai6 seng1 baang4 jat1 seng1.
examples.translation: An eyewitness said she heard a loud bang.

senses.definition: 形容一個人做錯嘢都唔知衰，冇羞恥感；唔知醜、唔理其他人眼光去做自己想做嘅嘢 (shameless; to know no shame; literally: thick-faced)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢塊面皮成呎厚，偷嘢俾人捉到都仲響度笑笑口。
examples.jyutping: koei5 faai3 min6 pei4 seng4 cek3 hau5, tau1 je5 bei2 jan4 zuk1 dou2 dou1 zung6 hai2 dou6 siu3 siu3 hau2.
examples.translation: He really has no shame and put on a cheeky face when caught stealing.

senses.definition: #英國#國旗 嘅俗稱，由英格蘭、蘇格蘭及愛爾蘭三面旗組合而成 (nickname of Union Flag of United Kingdom of Great Britain; literally "rice character flag", referencing the character "米")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #文職 嘅員工（量詞：個） (office clerk)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我係一個普通文員仔嚟㗎咋。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai6 jat1 go3 pou2 tung1 man4 jyun4 zai2 lei4 gaa3 zaa3.
examples.translation: I'm just an ordinary office clerk.

senses.definition: 一種光學裝置，包含好多#透鏡，令我哋見到一個放大咗嘅遠處影像（量詞：支） (telescope; binoculars)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daan1 tung2 mong6 jyun5 geng3
examples.translation: monocular

senses.definition: 事無大小都細心照顧關懷 (meticulous or carefully attentive to sby)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 媽咪無微不至噉照顧我哋，我哋好應該孝順佢嘅。
examples.jyutping: maa1 mi4 mou4 mei4 bat1 zi3 gam2 ziu3 gu3 ngo5 dei6, ngo5 dei6 hou2 jing1 goi1 haau3 seon6 keoi5 ge3.
examples.translation: Mum looks after us meticulously, we should be filial towards her.

senses.definition: 一個人嘅外貌同身形有做明星、藝人嘅潛質 (of one's appearance having the potential to become a celebrity or star)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 其實我覺得你都幾有明星相，你有冇諗過入娛樂圈？
examples.jyutping: kei4 sat6 ngo5 gok3 dak1 nei5 dou1 gei2 jau5 ming4 sing1 soeng3 nei5 jau5 mou5 nam2 gwo3 jap6 jyu4 lok6 hyun1.
examples.translation: To be honest, I think you look as attractive as a celebrity. Have you ever thought of being in the entertainment industry?

senses.definition: 複姓 (a compound surname, commonly transliterated as "Mo Yung")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 10,000 (ten thousand)
senses.label: 數詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 maan6 man1
examples.translation: ten thousand dollars

senses.definition: 公文、事務書信等文件（量詞：份） (official document)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: wui6 ji5 man4 syu1
examples.translation: meeting document

senses.definition: 處理公文同事務書信嘅工作 (paperwork)
處理文書嘅職員（量詞：個） (copy clerk)
同個名所宣稱嘅一樣，無呃人 (to be worthy of the name or reputation; to match the name to the reality)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢成日做義工，係名符其實嘅好人。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 zou6 ji6 gung1, hai6 ming4 fu4 kei4 sat6 ge3 hou2 jan4.
examples.translation: He is always a volunteer, he worth to be a good person.

senses.definition: 空氣唔流通、熱 (hot and stuffy (of weather, place))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 今日天氣咁悶熱，可能有颱風嚟喎。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 tin1 hei3 gam3 mun6 jit6, ho2 nang4 jau5 toi4 fung1 lai4 wo3.
examples.translation: Today's weather is so sultry, maybe a typhoon is coming.

senses.definition: 音譯自英文 modern，意即現代、時髦 ((English loan) Modern)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你太太打扮得好摩登喎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 taai3 taai2 daa2 baan6 dak1 hou2 mo1 dang1 wo3
examples.translation: Your wife dresses up in a very modern way.

senses.definition: 某人唔清醒；迷糊 ((of one's senses) dazed; confused)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢飲酒飲到個人迷迷糊糊。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jam2 zau2 jam2 dou3 go3 jan4 mai4 mai4 wu4 wu4.
examples.translation: He drinks to the point that his senses get very confused.

senses.definition: 仿製嘅、非正品；冒充他人嘅品牌 (fake; counterfeit; knock-off)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: mou6 paai4 fo3
examples.translation: a knock-off

senses.definition: 冇#羞恥 之心 (to have no sense of shame)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 zing3 jat1 lai5 ji6 lim4, mou4 ci2!
examples.translation: You don't have a sense of shame!

senses.definition: 凶猛；成功；#勁 (fierce; energetic; successful; powerful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: maang5 jan4
examples.translation: powerful person

senses.definition: #猛鬼 (haunted)

examples.jyutping: nei1 gaan1 uk1 hou2 maang5.
examples.translation: This house is haunted.

senses.definition: 水勢強烈 ((of water flow) strong; heavy; powerful)

examples.text: 個水喉開咁猛，啲水會fet到周圍都係。
examples.jyutping: go3 seoi2 hau4 hoi1 gam3 maang5, di1 seoi2 wui5 fet6 dou3 zau1 wai4 dou1 hai6.
examples.translation: The water flow from the tap is too strong. It will splash everywhere.

senses.definition: 喺兩方人或物之間，負責牽連兩者嘅人或物 (medium; agent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cyun4 bo3 mui4 gaai3
examples.translation: the mass media

senses.definition: 美好嘅風景 (beautiful scenery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: loeng4 san4 mei5 ging2
examples.translation: good time and beautiful scenery

senses.definition: #鬧；怪責 (to scold)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zau3 maa6
examples.translation: to curse and swear

senses.definition: 將平面覆蓋喺表面，喺上高出力，沿住表面移動，清除表面嘅污糟嘢或者水份 (to wipe; to dust off; to erase)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: mut3 toi2
examples.translation: to wipe the table

senses.definition: 冇#人脈 (lacking personal connection)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 喺新公司冇人冇脈，想升職冇咁易。
examples.jyutping: hai2 san1 gung1 si1 mou5 jan4 mou5 mak6, soeng2 sing1 zik1 mou5 gam3 ji6.
examples.translation: I have little personal connection at the new company. Getting promoted isn't that easy.

senses.definition: 裝喺#車 前面同後面嘅燈，喺大#霧 時開嚟畀其他車見到，前燈偏淡黃色或白色、後燈則為紅色 (fog light (of car))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 接近地面或者水面空氣中#水 點濃度大到影響#能見度 嘅現象 (mist; fog)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daai6 mou6
examples.translation: fog

senses.definition: 無論程度多定少；點都有啲 (more or less; somewhat)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 呢幾日啲天氣唔多唔少都影響到啲生意。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gei2 jat6 di1 tin1 hei3 m4 do1 m4 siu2 dou1 jing2 hoeng2 dou2 di1 saang1 ji3.
examples.translation: Our business has been affected somewhat by the weather these few days.

senses.definition: 模仿一樣嘢嘅外型，用嚟畀人玩、收藏或者紀念嘅工藝品；通常會比實物細，功能、材料亦未必會跟足 (model; miniature; replica)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mou4 jing4 ce1
examples.translation: model car

senses.definition: 一般日常用品同基本所需嘅價格（量詞:個） (commodity price)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mat6 gaa3 fei1 zoeng3
examples.translation: prices are going up

senses.definition: #樣子、#面口 (appearance; face)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: suk6 min6 hung2
examples.translation: familiar face

senses.definition: 生果；橢圓形，形厚多汁，果肉通常黃黃地色，味道甜美（量詞：個／隻） (mango)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mong1 gwo2 zap1
examples.translation: mango juice

senses.definition: 即係#電單車（量詞：架） (motorcycle)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zaa1 din6 daan1 ce1 hou2 ngai4 him2.
examples.translation: It's dangerous to drive a motorcycle.

senses.definition: 冇好食嘅嘢 (to have nothing but bad food; literally: not even a mouthful of good food)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢區真係冇啖好食，附近啲餐廳又貴又難食！
examples.jyutping: nei1 keoi1 zan1 hai6 mou5 daam6 hou2 sik6, fu6 gan6 di1 caan1 teng1 jau6 gwai3 jau6 naan4 sik6.
examples.translation: There is nothing but bad food in this area. The restaurants nearby are expensive and only offer tasteless food!

senses.definition: 引申指經濟艱難，生活難過 (figuratively, to fall on hard times; to experience difficulties; to be unable or struggle to make a living)

examples.text: 呢排經濟唔好，個個都冇啖好食。
examples.jyutping: ni1 paai4 ging1 zai3 m4 hou2, go3 go3 dou1 mou5 daam6 hou2 sik6.
examples.translation: Lately the economy has been bad. Everyone is having a hard time putting food on the table.

senses.definition: 一切嘅遭遇都係由命運預先安排 (to be written in the stars; to be predetermined by fate)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢哋最終都一齊番，似乎一切都係命中注定。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 zeoi3 zung1 dou1 jat1 cai4 faan1, ci5 fu4 jat1 cai3 dou1 hai6 ming6 zung1 zyu3 ding6
examples.translation: In the end, they got back together—it's as if it were written in the stars all along.

senses.definition: 開始發生、產生某個諗法 (to start growing an idea)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢老細成日拖糧，搞到佢萌生去意。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 lou5 sai3 sing4 jat6 to1 loeng4, gaau2 dou3 keoi5 mang4 sang1 heoi3 ji3.
examples.translation: His boss has always been late in paying his salary so the idea of resignation starts growing in his mind.

senses.definition: #命 (meng6) 嘅戲謔講法（量詞：條） (a humorous way to refer to one's life)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔好咁搏，要顧住條命仔呀。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 gam3 bok3, jiu3 gu3 zyu6 tiu4 meng6 zai2 aa3.
examples.translation: Don't take too many risks. Take care of your own life.

senses.definition: #錫 (sek3) ，用嘴輕輕掂一下對方顯示親暱關係嘅行為（量詞：個） (a kiss)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: co1 man5
examples.translation: First kiss

senses.definition: 對年紀較細嘅#女仔 嘅稱呼 (a term of address used for little/young girls)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢班妹妹仔好畀心機跳舞。
examples.jyutping: ni1 baan1 mui4 mui1 zai2 hou2 bei2 sam1 gei1 tiu3 mou5.
examples.translation: These girls make an effort to dance.

senses.definition: 喺現時、而家呢一刻 (at present; at the moment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你哋唔好嘈喇，目前最緊要嘅係保持冷靜。
examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 m4 hou2 cou4 laa3, muk6 cin4 zeoi3 gan2 jiu3 ge3 hai6 bou2 ci4 laang5 zing6.
examples.translation: Stop arguing with each other, the most important thing at the moment is to stay calm.

senses.definition: 以前#唐樓 專畀工人上落嘅樓梯（量詞：條） (in old days, the stairs built in tenement house for house helpers only)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 雙方有嫌隙、#牙齒印 未化解，相見嘅時候好尷尬 (to turn one's head away in anger; to not talk with each other; not on good terms with; literally "face obstructed")
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢哋兩個自從上次吵大鑊之後一直都面左左。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 go3 zi6 cung4 soeng6 ci3 caau2 daai6 wok6 zi1 hau6 jat1 zik6 dou1 min6 zo2 zo2.
examples.translation: Even since the two of them had a big argument, they always turned their heads away, not talking to each other.

senses.definition: 毋須用語言嘅情況之下，所達成嘅理解或者協定 (tacit understanding; tacit agreement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋呢對雙胞胎嘅默契特別好。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 nei1 deoi3 soeng1 baau1 toi1 ge3 mak6 kai3 dak6 bit6 hou2.
examples.translation: This pair of twins has very good tacit understanding.

senses.definition: 唔係#淨係；後句經常有「#而且」、「#仲」一齊用 (not only)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 我哋唔單只去行街，仲去咗睇戲添。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 m4 daan1 zi2 heoi3 haang4 gaai1, zung6 heoi3 zo2 tai2 hei3 tim1.
examples.translation: We didn't just go shopping, we even watched a movie.

senses.definition: 唔係#淨係；後句經常有「#而且」、「#仲」一齊用 (not only)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 我哋唔淨只去行街，仲去咗睇戲添。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 m4 zing6 zi2 heoi3 haang4 gaai1, zung6 heoi3 zo2 tai2 hei3 tim1.
examples.translation: We didn't just go shopping, we even watched a movie.

senses.definition: 唔#畏懼 (fearless)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 無畏無懼至會無堅不摧。
examples.jyutping: mou4 wai3 mou4 geoi6 zi3 wui5 mou4 gin1 bat1 ceoi1.
examples.translation: A person of no fear is thus unbeatable.

senses.definition: 越嚟越差；持續惡化；不斷倒退 (to become worse and worse; to steadily deteriorate)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢嘅病情每況愈下，可能就嚟唔得......
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ge3 beng6 cing4 mui5 fong3 jyu6 haa6, ho2 nang4 zau6 lai4 m4 dak1...
examples.translation: His illness is getting worse. Perhaps he will pass away very soon...

senses.definition: 聰明；神奇 (clever; ingenious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 nam2 faat3 sat6 zoi6 miu6!
examples.translation: This idea is so clever!

senses.definition: 魔術、魔法嘅力量 (magic power)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 引申指令人崇拜嘅吸引力 (figuratively, charm)

examples.text: 究竟呢個模特兒有咩魔力呢？
examples.jyutping: gau3 ging2 nei1 go3 mou4 dak6 ji4 jau5 me1 mo1 lik6 ne1?
examples.translation: Actually where does the charm lie in this model?

senses.definition: #除；拎走（衫褲之類） (to remove; to take off (usually one's clothing))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: mok1 saam1
examples.translation: to remove one's clothes

senses.definition: 搣走（外殼等等） (to peel; to peel off)

examples.jyutping: mok1 hok3
examples.translation: to shell

senses.definition: 唔識睇同寫字嘅人（量詞：個） (illiterate)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢媽媽係文盲，要人幫手覆佢啲信。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 maa4 maa1 hai6 man4 maang4, jiu3 jan4 bong1 sau2 fuk1 keoi5 di1 seon3.
examples.translation: His mother is an illiterate, so she needs others' help to reply to his letters.

senses.definition: 唔驚衰運 (to be undaunted by bad luck or negative superstitions)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 醫生叫我戒酒，我唔信邪，日日照飲。
examples.jyutping: ji1 sang1 giu3 ngo5 gaai3 zau2, ngo5 m4 seon3 ce2, jat6 jat6 ziu3 jam2.
examples.translation: My doctor told me to quit alcohol. Undaunted by the consequences, I keep drinking every day.

senses.definition: 有清晰、明顯嘅目的噉做一啲嘢，通常係壞事或唔俾面其他人 (blatantly; unabashedly; doing something with clear intention, often negative or disrespectful)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ming4 waan2
examples.translation: to clearly be playing a trick on

senses.definition: 指講嘢有口音 ((literally) neither salty nor tasteless; not very accurate in one's pronunciation of a foreign language)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢啲廣東話唔鹹唔淡，有時都唔明佢噏乜。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 di1 gwong2 dung1 waa6 m4 haam4 m4 taam5, jau5 si4 dou1 m4 ming4 keoi5 ap1 mat1.
examples.translation: His Cantonese pronunciation is not very accurate. Sometimes I have difficulty understanding him.

senses.definition: 乏味 (insipid)
#兩頭唔到岸 (to be caught between two stools)

examples.text: 晏晝食得唔夠飽，食晚飯又太早，唔鹹唔淡，食下午茶好過。
examples.jyutping: aan3 zau3 sik6 dak1 m4 gau3 baau2, sik6 maan5 faan6 jau6 taai3 zou2, m4 haam4 m4 taam5, sik6 haa6 ng5 caa4 hou2 gwo3.
examples.translation: I didn't eat enough for lunch, and it's still too early to eat dinner. I'm caught between two stools, so I might be better off just having afternoon tea.

senses.definition: #夜晚 (night)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 晚頭都嚟喇，我要返歸喫飯。
examples.jyutping: maan5 tau4 dou1 lai4 laa3, ngo5 jiu3 faan1 gwai1 jaak3 faan6.
examples.translation: The night has come, I need to go home for dinner.

senses.definition: 用針將顏料注入皮下組織而成嘅文字或者圖案（量詞：個） (tattoo)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你個紋身好靚呀，喺邊度紋㗎？
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 man4 san1 hou2 leng3 aa3, hai2 bin1 dou6 man4 gaa3?
examples.translation: Your tattoo is pretty! Where did you get it?

senses.definition: 用唔着，冇用途，冇建樹，唔啱用 (useless; of no use; not useful for the situation)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢件嘢冇用㗎喇，掉咗佢啦。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 je5 mou5 jung6 gaa3 laa3, deu6 zo2 keoi5 laa1.
examples.translation: This thing is useless anymore, please throw it away.

senses.definition: 科學領域嘅一門，專係研究物質、能量、同埋佢哋喺時空入面嘅運動。物理學家通常用數學方程式嚟表達有關呢啲嘢嘅定律。 (physics)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松佢乜嘢數學都唔識就走去學人讀物理，結果炒曬。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 keoi5 mat1 je5 sou3 hok6 dou1 m4 sik1 zau6 zau2 heoi3 hok6 jan4 duk6 mat6 lei5, git3 gwo2 caau2 saai3.
examples.translation: A-chung doesn't know a thing about mathematics but chose to major in physics. He ended up failing it all.

senses.definition: 對於某一啲人或者某一啲事表示不滿 (to complain (about somebody or something))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 與其喺度埋怨人哋，不如多啲反省下自己。
examples.jyutping: jyu5 kei4 hai2 dou6 maai4 jyun3 jan4 dei6, bat1 jyu4 do1 di1 faan2 sing2 haa5 zi6 gei2
examples.translation: Instead of complaining about others, you should reflect more on yourself.

senses.definition: 人民自己方面；民眾自身，唔係官方嘅 (folk; popular; non-government)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: man4 gaan1 gu3 si6
examples.translation: folk tales; folk stories; folklore

senses.definition: #就位；去返自己嘅位置度準備；演藝界常用 (to get into position; to take one's place; to be ready to start)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 全世界埋位！由打劫嗰幕再拍過！
examples.jyutping: cyun4 sai3 gaai3 maai4 wai2! jau4 daa2 gip3 go2 mok6 zoi3 paak3 gwo3!
examples.translation: Get in your positions everyone. Let's start from the robbery scene.

senses.definition: #大門；#出入口（量詞：個） (doorway; entrance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你好出門口喇，唔係就遲到㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 hou2 ceot1 mun4 hau2 laa3, m4 hai6 zau6 ci4 dou3 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: You should leave home, or you will be late.

senses.definition: 同#人文、#藝術 或者#社會科學 相關嘅學科嘅統稱；通常會同#理工、#商科 相對 (liberal arts; arts stream)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 duk6 man4 fo1 ding6 duk6 lei5 fo1 gaa3?
examples.translation: Do you study the arts stream or the science stream?

senses.definition: 體驗唔到、出席唔到，或者把握唔到機會 (to not manage to experience or attend; to fail to take advantage of (an opportunity))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 mis1 zo2 cam4 jat6 coeng4 gong2 zo6.
examples.translation: I missed yesterday's talk.

senses.definition: 漏咗留意或者考慮 (to fail to notice or consider)

examples.jyutping: wai3, ting1 ziu1 mai5 mis1 ko1 aa3.
examples.translation: Hey, don't miss calls tomorrow morning.

senses.definition: 有心唔透露一啲資訊，去誤導其他人，從中得利；隱瞞欺騙 (to deceive; to cheat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢瞞騙政府領取失業救濟金。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mun4 pin3 zing3 fu2 ling5 ceoi2 sat1 jip6 gau3 zai3 gam1.
examples.translation: He deceived the government to receive unemployment benefit.

senses.definition: 冇得反擊 (to be unable to strike back or retaliate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 臨尾一局#十三幺，你哋真係冇仇報喇。
examples.jyutping: lam4 mei5 jat1 guk6 sap6 saam1 jiu1, nei5 dei6 zan1 hai6 mou5 sau4 bou3 laa3.

examples.translation: He's been working for this company for so long; you should appreciate his hard work. How can you just fire him like that?

senses.definition: 用於連接如果唔滿足前句條件，就會引發後句嘅結果 (otherwise; or else)

senses.definition: 講嘢刻薄 (mean; harsh; bitter; usually referring to words somebody says as opposed to actions)

examples.translation: A mean person

senses.definition: #睇實、#睇住、看管住敵方球員，指防守球員不斷靠近纏繞敵方進攻球員，利用#腯身位 技巧，阻礙對方傳送、射球、走位，並伺機偷走個波阻斷攻勢。 (to man mark someone, means a defender to get close to the attacker and try to block the enemy's transfer, shoot and re-position, to make space trying to steal the ball and break the attack.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: Ah Ming help me to mark No.6.

senses.definition: #睇實、#睇住、看管住敵方球員，指防守球員不斷靠近纏繞敵方進攻球員，利用#腯身位 技巧，阻礙對方傳送、射球、走位，並伺機偷走個波阻斷攻勢。 (to man mark someone, means a defender to get close to the attacker and try to block the enemy's transfer, shoot and re-position, to make space trying to steal the ball and break the attack.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 阿明一陣同我#mark住 6號，阿華去睇實10號，要mark實啲，OK？
examples.translation: Ah Ming help me to mark No.6, Ah Wah go watch over No.10, you have to man mark him real hard, ok?

senses.definition: 黑紙白字記低、寫住重要事情 (to jot down or to mark down important things in black and white)

senses.definition: 除晒衫，或者俾人除晒衫 (to remove one's clothes completely; to strip naked; to be stripped naked; literally: to take the clothes off a pig)

examples.jyutping: cung1 loeng4 gang2 hai6 jiu3 mok1 gwong1 zyu1 gaa3 laa1!
examples.translation: Indeed you need to remove your clothes completely when you take a bath!

senses.definition: （喺賭博）輸清光，連衫褲都要除落嚟抵押 (to be "cleaned out" in gambling)
（捉棋時）除主帥外所有棋死清光 ((usu. of chess game) to strip bare; to lose all your pieces)

examples.text: 乜你咁慘俾人剝光豬啊！
examples.jyutping: mat1 nei5 gam3 caam2 bei2 jan4 mok1 gwong1 zyu1 aa3!
examples.translation: What a pity you got stripped of all your chess pieces.

senses.definition: 形容人做嘢嘅時候好慢；#從容不迫；好悠閒；一啲都唔匆忙；好似完全唔緊張進度咁 (very slowly and imperturbable; unhurriedly and leisurely)

examples.translation: You do not need to feel guilty because it is not your fault at all.

senses.definition: 地方名；係#西班牙 首都，位於中部；周圍嘅行政區亦都叫馬德里，而馬德里城就係成個行政區嘅#首府 (Madrid)

senses.definition: 唔舒服；有啲拘謹 (uncomfortable, uneasy)

senses.definition: #有名、普通人都認得嘅#牌子（通常指高級、貴價嘅牌子）（量詞：個／隻） (famous brand; name brand (usually refers to more expensive brands))

examples.translation: They don't get along well. Why would they want to hang on to the relationship?

senses.definition: 喺人或者動物死咗之後，將佢嘅遺體#埋 落地下；多數會同時係上面立一啲標記或者#墓碑 (to bury; to entomb)

senses.definition: 高級而值好多錢嘅，通常用嚟形容奢侈品 (valuable; precious; usually used to described luxurious goods such as sports cars, jewelry, high class apartments, etc.)

mou sam caap lau lau sing jam

senses.definition: 唔止一個，竟然仲要有第二個；表示兩件已經非常罕見嘅事或者兩個人非常相似 (not to come singly but in pairs;)

senses.definition: 好#勉強 咁去做一件事 (to undertake to do a difficult job as best as one can; to push somebody to take on a difficult job)

senses.definition: 家庭限制成員可以最遲返屋企嘅時間；或者指本身限制最遲返屋企時間呢個行為 (curfew; starting time of the curfew; typically, refers to curfew issued by family or parents)

senses.definition: 將本應用嚟捉小動物嘅三面網變成一面，比喻寬大仁厚，對犯錯嘅人寬容處置 (to give the wrongdoer a chance; to be lenient)
